4a1('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings pa lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyedad kyis tshor ba las gud na yang
4a2('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi maso chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yod kyi 'dus te rog pa'i rkyerang kyis tshor 'amo/ sa'i sus kyang ro ba
4a3('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags sa'i khams las kung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i kham sa / chu li dza bris kyi pa skye bya
4a4('bum): ma lags chu'i khams las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings pa sa chis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chob kyi dbye pa nyid kyang cu'i khams ma// mye'i khams cid tu ma
4a5('bum): kyi byings pasas kye'i khams las grangs yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ me'i rnams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang kye'i 'amam so// rlung gi zham
4a6('bum): kyang chos 'i dbyings ma lags bas chung kyi khams las gung ma yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nung kyi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung kyi kham ma 'o// rnam ma la'i
4a7('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rnam sa pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam ma 'a'i kham pa so// 
4a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rnam par shes bu'i khams sasu kud na sang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbying sa so chos kyi dbyings
4b1('bum): nyid kyang rnam par zhes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags ma rig pa las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so / chos kyi dbyings nyid
4b2('bum): kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// nas
4b3('bum): par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// 
4b4('bum): phyir dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags mying dang gzu kas las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mying dang ga/ thugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
4b5('bum): mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags skye mched drug las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings po chis te skye lached drug nyid kyang chos kyi dam po chas kyang phyongs nyid kyang sa med dus go/ 
4b6('bum): dbyings kyang reg pa 'tshor ba'o// reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg
4b7('bum): byang byangs pa tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings pa lags tshor ba las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// med pa yang
4b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags sred pa las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// le nad pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
5a1('bum): lend pa las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lend pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags srid
5a2('bum): pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
5a3('bum): sa mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzhi nyid kyang chos kyi
5a4('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
5a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
5a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las kung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyirang / 
5a7('bum): pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings pa lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las kung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang chos
5a8('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang babod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags bcor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi rang ba las gung ra yang
5b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings pa mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa'o// bsam gtad kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa yang
5b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam
5b3('bum): katan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ayang chos kyi dbyings ma lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
5b4('bum): tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang
5b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags phyi stong pa nyid
5b6('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang
5b7('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings pa 'a
5b8('bum): lags stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa
6a1('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa
6a2('bum): nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang don
6a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi
6a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus pa
6a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyanga'adus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'dra ba stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
6a6('bum): pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings michi nye mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dpas myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
6a7('bum): ma lags thog ma dang tha sa myed pa stong pa nyid las kud ma yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings po chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
6a8('bum): stong pa nyid do// dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid las gungs yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro ba myed pa stong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// ma
6b1('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor babyed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags rang bzhis stong pa nyid las grang sa yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
6b2('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags chos thams cad stong pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos
6b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gung
6b4('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi nga chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
6b5('bum): dbyings ma lags/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi dmyigs
6b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ngas ma lags dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos ki dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po myong ba stong pa nyid kyang
6b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
6b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po bye bang po sde stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gung
7a1('bum): sa mang chos kyi dbyings sa ma ces gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams so// nas bim parang pa'i na stong pa nyid dang / so nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngos nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar/ 
7a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyir chos kyi dbyings pa mams d+ma lnga dang pa myed pa las gu na ya chos kyi dbyings byam mchis te/ rnam par mdang rjon pa nyi bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rom kyi dkyim ma / chos kyi gris
7a3('bum): nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag ma tho ba nyid dang mtshan sa myed pa dang smonang pa myed pa'o// pa smon pa rams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang drag pa sa spong ba nyid
7a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyams dag par das pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so kyi mchos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyims dmasanas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gung sa mang ngos
7a5('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrus kyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ma khrims mchis kyings nyid kyang chu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnam so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
7a6('bum): dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid chos kyi dbyings s+ho/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs
7a7('bum): rnams las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
7a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag nas po// lam yang chos kyi dbyings la
7b1('bum): lags lam las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos mya lags/ 'phags pa'i
7b2('bum): bden pa rnams las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi
7b3('bum): dbyings ma lags bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsas gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa rnams kya
7b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags tshad myed pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings myang sa so tshad myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// 
7b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbying chos kyi dbyings ma mchis pyad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gung da bya chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
7b6('bum): par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma chos kyi dbyes ram pa lags ras byed pa kyang grong se par b.rad pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings su lags rnas par 'arang ba des
7b7('bum): las grang na yang chos kyi dbyings pa mchis te/ rnam rlung ba sna pa nyid do/ ram nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings sa lags su rnamapa so// pashA dkyis gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'dun pa rnam
7b8('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings pa lags mabar dkyis sa kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngom nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myem song ba nyid kyang tsam ste pa rang bris gnas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dakhyimamon
8a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
8a2('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa myed pa dang spronang pa myed pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings snga ma mchis te/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang sprodad pa myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi
8a3('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smonang pa myed pa'o// mngon par zhes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags mngon par shes pa rnams las
8a4('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par she sa pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang chos kyi
8a5('bum): dbyings ma lags ting nge 'dzind rnams las gud na ya pa chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so
8a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings mo/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs
8a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
8a8('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags su/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
8b1('bum): ma mchis te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kying dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags so so yang dag par rig
8b2('bum): pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sa so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang
8b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma sngags byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje
8b4('bum): po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags snying rje chen po las su da na yang rgyo su sla mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi dngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// 
8b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na ya nga chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
8b6('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
8b7('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
8b8('bum): 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ny+dzakyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
9a1('bum): byir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yas chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las kud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
9a2('bum): nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos
9a3('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang
9a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang chas kyi dbyangs ma lags rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang
9a5('bum): chub bo// / lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las kud na yang chos kyi/ dbyings ma mchis te/ lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang
9a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pashes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
9a7('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnams pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
9a8('bum): kyis bka' sa ya pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so / tshor ba nye kyang chos
9a9('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang 'du byed do// rnam
9b1('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
9b2('bum): nyid na ba'o// sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snga'o// lce chos kyi dbyings bro/ chos kyi dbyings kyang sre'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings sa kyi byings kyi thung du ba so bya ma kyi
9b3('bum): dbyings chos kyi phyis kyi kyang med chos kyang kyi byo ni kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos s+ho// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
9b4('bum): kyang sgra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings lo// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dI'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'o rig nyid la kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
9b5('bum): sa khyo myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kying dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyi kyang chos kyi dbyings ma tu rkye pa
9b6('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snga'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// 
9b7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam
9b8('bum): shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
10a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'i kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi la
10a2('bum): dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
10a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// 
10a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
10a5('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i skye nad kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
10a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// phyi
10a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i 'ams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
10a8('bum): nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mye'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mye'i khams so// 
10b1('bum): rlung kyi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid rlung kyi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes
10b2('bum): pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi
10b3('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe na dbyes so chos kyi dbying pa nyid kyang dag mying dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye
10b4('bum): mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// sa kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg 'o// tshor ba nyi kyang chos kyi 'byas
10b5('bum): dbyings ma'i chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so kyis chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lend pa'o// srid panyi kyang chos kyi
10b6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
10b7('bum): kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ 
10b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi
11a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa' nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ 
11a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsas gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings snyed kyang zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// rang stong
11a3('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so
11a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
11a5('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa
11a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha'
11a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ji chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
11a8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// rlob
11b1('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos shes cad chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/ 
11b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang
11b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do sa nyid tong ba 'i bya chos kyi phye mchis kyi dbyis ci kyang ngob ni sngo pa 'o dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying/ 
11b4('bum): nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spo/ 
11b5('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa bdag par spong ba rnams lo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
11b6('bum): rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan
11b7('bum): lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
11b8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
12a1('bum): nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi
12a2('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par tha dad pa rnams so// mthard
12a3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
12a4('bum): pa dang smon pa myed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so kyang byed nirna par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa mye da pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
12a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzidad rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
12a6('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jig pa 'i kyi chos kyi
12a7('bum): skyi po chos kyi dbying ni kyang kyi 'jig pa sa so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
12a8('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa men pa la/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings mo// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang zhi pede chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi som sa 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings po / chos kyi phyim
12b1('bum): nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa rnams so// chunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// la rad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
12b2('bum): bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o
12b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
12b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad
12b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid do// rab 'byor dkal te sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos
12b6('bum): 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par yang myi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
12b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad myir myed pa la mying kyi brdar chos ston to// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 
12b8('bum): 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig ces bya'o// 'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o// 
13a1('bum): 'di ni sna zhes bya'o 'di ni lce zhes bya'o// 'di ni sus zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid ces bya'o// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni dwi zhes bya'o// 'di ni ro zhes bya'o// 
13a2('bum): 'di ni reg ces bya'o 'di ni ma rtso 'di ni myig kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di
13a3('bum): ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// nyid ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg
13a4('bum): pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te re ga pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
13a5('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zhes bya'o// 'di ni snga'i 'dus te re ka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus
13a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams zhes
13a7('bum): bya'o// 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni mye'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rlung kyi khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o dang rna na dam/ pan byalo 'di 'i 'du byed zhes bya'o 'don na dge pa zhes byan 'di
13a8('bum): ni myid dang gzugs zhes byang 'don myi mched drug se gyu 'di ni reg pa des po 'di ni tsher bul zhes bya'o// 'di'i sred pa zhes bya'o// 'de mi le nad pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes rgya ma 'dini sgo zan
13b1('bum): bya'o// 'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni/ 
13b2('bum): btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni
13b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chen pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa
13b4('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o 'di ni mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid des bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha
13b5('bum): byed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ 'dini rang bzhir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang kyis
13b6('bum): ti mang pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di'i phyi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rangs po byed pa stong pa nyid ces byang 'di mi bab nyid stong pa nyid ces pa 'di'i dngos po byed pa'i ngos nyid stong pa nyid ces bya
13b7('bum): di dag medran pa rtse bar gzhag pa rnams zhes rgya/ 'di dag ni yang dag par spong pa rnams zhes bya/ 'di dag ni chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'adi dag me rnams zhes rgyam ma
14a1('bum): rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni tshad myed pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par tha dad pa brgyad ces bya'o// 'di dag
14a2('bum): ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes
14a3('bum): bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya'o// 
14a4('bum): 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dang ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
14a5('bum): zhes bya'o// 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya 'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni dgra bcom
14a6('bum): pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni rang byang chub ces bya'o// 'di ni lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo ces bya'o zhes ston to// rab 'byor de 'di
14a7('bum): lce dper na sgyu ma'i la khan po 'am/ skul byed pa'i mtshan bu ma'am pa zhig gis rdzas kyi rnam pa byin zhig la bted te/ gzugs kyi bye brag lnga tshogs 'di sa ste/ glang po che'i gzug sa
14a8('bum): 'i gzugs pas ba yang kyi gzugs sas/ rdzam la/ sug gi gzugs sus/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dam/ bye'u'am/ bu mo'i gzugs sas/ srung mam tshas na
14b1('bum): myed khapa 'am/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal las/ kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dkal ba 'am/ rdzing bu mdangs dka' ba 'am/ dgas tshal mdangs dga' ba dag yul da te/ de dag tu sta nad dang / 'khor gi stan
14b2('bum): dang / bzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa bting ste/ mye tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spros pa dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / s+yan gzigs zhim po dag bstand tam klu dang / sil snyand kis skye bo dag dka' bar
14b3('bum): byas nas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/ tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am bzod pa bsgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus pa rtsam pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par brtse zhing / shes rab sgom pa dang / rnam
14b4('bum): pa de lta bu dag kyis skye bo dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhi nga mtho' ba'i rigs bstand tam bram ze'i che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs bstand tam khyim bdag che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs
14b5('bum): bstand tam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ sum cu tsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstand tam mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstand tam dga' ldan ki lha rnams 'a
14b6('bum): bstand tam 'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstand tam gzhal 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstand tam tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan da nyims ga nye ba 'i da pan tos ku 'khor gyi lha rnams bstand tam/ tshangs
14b7('bum): chen gyi lha rnams bstand tam sdang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam chung snad kyi lha rnams bstand tam tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams bstand tam kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstand ta ma dge
14b8('bum): ba'i lha rnams bstand tam chung dge'i sgra rnams bstan tam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstand tam/ che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chu che'i lha rnams
15a1('bum): ha/ bsta rang tam chang byed che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstand tam/ phyi che ba'i lha rnams bstanan tam/ skye gdung ba'i bla rnams bstanang tam
15a2('bum): shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tam gya nom sdang ba'i lha rnams bstan da tam 'og myin kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bsta rang tam/ rnam shes maH
15a3('bum): sas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams bsta dang tam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed sbyin skye mched kyi sku gzugs myed pa rnams bstan da tam/ rgya nang tu zhun
15a4('bum): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan da tam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed
15a5('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa dang / bcon
15a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la myod pa dang / phyi stong pa
15a7('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
15a8('bum): la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' sas 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog pa dang tha sa myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myod pa
15b1('bum): pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa
15b2('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
15b3('bum): rnams la gyod pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sa gyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la myod pa dang / stobs rnams la gyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i las
15b4('bum): yan lag brkyang ba la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pal khyod pa dang / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang
15b5('bum): sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang
15b6('bum): sadrug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ma bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brkyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa sum yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ma bcu
15b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed pa 'dug mngod pa shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par che zhing / 'jig rten kyi kham sna dang / 
15b8('bum): bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang / myang bar dka' ba'i phyir / 
16a1('bum): kyong ba'ide bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / gyi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / ma ma yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub
16a2('bum): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de dag bstan nga tam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nyi lag yas cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan
16a3('bum): de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma myi 'dis legs par bsrab pa ngo mtshar che'o// re mdzes pa dag byed/ de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing / gzugs
16a4('bum): bye brag sna tshogs 'dis sa/ glang po 'i'i gzugs rta'i gzugs dang / bgrad kyi gzugs dang / rnga mo dang sug kyi gzugs dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / 
16a5('bum): bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang skyed mos tshal dang / gzham myed khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga'i ra pa mdangs dka' ba stond pa dang / rdzing bu mdangs dka' ba
16a6('bum): stond pa dang / nags tshal mdangs dka' ba stond pa dang / de dag tu stand dang / 'khor gyi sta na dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs pa bting ste/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byuH
16a7('bum): pa dang / kha zas dang / gyan gzigs mang po de lta bu sto nang pa dang / klu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sbub
16a8('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus thom pa dang / ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par che pa dang / shes rab skom pa dang / rnam pa 'di dag kyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba'i rigs stond pa dang
16b1('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mthol ba'i rigs sto rang pa dang / khyim bdag che zhing mthol ba'i rigs sto dang pa dang / ri rab stond pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams stonang pa dang / sum phun cha gsum ki A/ 
16b2('bum): rnams stond pa dang / mtshe ma'i lharna pas ston pa dang / dka' ldan ki lha rnams stonang pa dang / 'phrul dka'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams stond pa dang / tshangs ris kyi
16b3('bum): sgra rnams stond pa dang / tshangs lha nye phan kyi lha rnams stond pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams stond pa dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams stond pa dang / sdang ba'i lha rnams stond pa dang / chung snang kyi
16b4('bum): spa rnams ston pa dang / tshad myed sdang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang / kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / dge ba'i lha rnams stond pa dang / chung dge'i lha rnams stond pa dang / 
16b5('bum): chang myed dge ba'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / 'bras bu ba'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / phyi che ba'i lha rnams ston par @/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams stonang pa dang / shi nang tu mthong
16b6('bum): ba'i sgra rnams stond pa dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams stond pa dang / 'og myin ki lha rnams stond pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams stond pa dang / rnam shes mtha'
16b7('bum): sas skye mched kyi lha rnams stond pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i chu stonang pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skyes na na sa gzugs myed pa nas stond pa dang / chu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
16b8('bum): stonod pa dang / nga yun cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mang po stond cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
17a1('bum): bzung ste/ smin pa'i pha rol da tu phyind pa la myod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / brtsotson 'grus kyi pha rol
17a2('bum): tu phyind pa la myod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi
17a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la pyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong
17a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa
17a5('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyig sa pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
17a6('bum): la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la gyod pa dang / 
17a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la pyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan laka rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang
17a8('bum): bus sa kat+ta s+ya dang / nam mam tha rang pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gyod pa dang / sa dpa' yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
17b1('bum): dang / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa'
17b2('bum): bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par rdzogs par byed pa dang / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 
17b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyor byed par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par che ba dang / 'jig rtend kyi khams rnams sdang bar byed pa dang
17b4('bum): sems can rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sangs da rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / yan lag dang nyid la dag yongs su gtong ba dang // dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang / 
17b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su swA ba pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / 
17b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa de dag stond cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag
17b7('bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par bstond pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzind to// de la skyes bu mkhas shing gsal la yid rno ba dang ldan pa/ spyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni
17b8('bum): 'di snyam ste/ 'di la chos gang yang dmyigs su myed na/ mying 'di de ltar myed pa'i chos kyis skye bo mang po dka' bar byed pa'i ni ngo mtshar mang du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/ sems cas 'di dag ni
18a1('bum): dngos po myed pa la/ dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya bar de dag kyi zhes pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya / shes rab kyi pha
18a2('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang skyi mthong ste/ thabs mkhas pas sems cad rnams yongs su smyin par byed kyang / sems can du phyi dbyigs
18a3('bum): sems can du gdags pa bye dmyigs te/ bdag kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skus pa yin/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yis/ sems can gzhan gang sbyin
18a4('bum): ba yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing / mthunapas dka' bar khyod pa yin/ bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/ gzhan yang tshul khrims srung ba la ma
18a5('bum): nga par thus pa yin su sems kyi legs pa brjod pasen sems can gzhan kyang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bamagyong ma par
18a6('bum): kyang bzad paldanas pa yid ga'am pa bcad pa sang dag par sprus pa / bzad pa'i lags pa 'dod pa yis/ sems cad ga'adu ga sod pa gnas padred
18a7('bum): ning mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin bdas kyang brtsor 'gram tshom tha yin/ ka'ang yang 'artsor 'grus kyil bu la yang dag par sprus pa snyed/ skyon 'grus kyi
18a8('bum): sem la tha ga'an gapab rtson 'grus mam la'i ngag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pa sa dga' ba sna dga' bar byed pa yis/ bang kyang tsho 'dzin pa rnams par 'jug pas
18b1('bum): gzhan yang ting nge 'dzind la yang dag par skul ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin gi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems cad gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs brjod cing mthun pas dka'/ 
18b2('bum): par spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang shes rab skom pa yin/ gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skal ba yin/ shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang shes rab sgom pa de dag gi/ 
18b3('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzind pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamra la yang dag par skul pa yin/ dge ba
18b4('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam ki legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzind pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa
18b5('bum): yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i kaso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan ba'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul ba yin/ yan
18b6('bum): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gi legs pa brjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar
18b7('bum): spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par 'dzind pa yin/ gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa
18b8('bum): yin/ sems can gzhan kang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par 'dzind pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar khyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa
19a1('bum): yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bsam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
19a2('bum): 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar pyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul pa
19a3('bum): yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ 
19a4('bum): ba rig kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ nga gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par bskul ba yin bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ 
19a5('bum): sems can gzhan kang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'ju ga pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par
19a6('bum): 'jug pa yin gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul pa yin bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang lam sa gtan nasas s+ho 'jug pa dedas kyi gas
19a7('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul pa yin/ byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ seMs
19a8('bum): can gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par
19b1('bum): bskal ba yin/ snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms
19b2('bum): par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang dka' ba la yang dag par skus pa yin dka' ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dka' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
19b3('bum): bas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang btang snyoms par yang dag par bskul ba yin/ btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can
19b4('bum): gzhan kang btang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan
19b5('bum): yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan kang nam mkha' mtha' yas
19b6('bum): skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar pyod pa yin// bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes
19b7('bum): mtha na yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod papa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
19b8('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang dag par bskul ba yin/ 
20a1('bum): cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod
20a2('bum): pa yin bdag kyang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'du shes myed 'du shes
20a3('bum): myed myin skye mched la legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can la gzhan gang 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing dri mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yi
20a4('bum): bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzha na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul pa yi na/ tran bya tre bar gzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod
20a5('bum): pa yin sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar skyo da pa yin// bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams
20a6('bum): rlom pa yin/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin yang dag par spong byu kyi legs pa brjod ba yin/ sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba sgom pa de dag gi len/ 
20a7('bum): pa mdzod cing mthun pas dga' bar 'apyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 'ardzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
20a8('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar pyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dbang po rnams bsgom pa yin/ 
20b1('bum): gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar
20b2('bum): spyod pa yin// bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang stobs sa
20b3('bum): sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba
20b4('bum): yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin
20b5('bum): bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyan pa la yA dag pa skul ba lI/ ya ka pI yA ag brgyad pI leg pa brjo ni mes gzhan gang 'phags kyi
20b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa'i
20b7('bum): sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
20b8('bum): bas dka' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa
21a1('bum): yin/ sems can gzhan gang rnam par thard pa brgyad sgom pa de dag ki legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin// bdag kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ 
21a2('bum): pa dgu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ 
21a3('bum): sems can gzhan gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku' sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa yin/ gzhan
21a4('bum): yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga sgom pa de dag gi legs
21a5('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzi nad rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa la yang yang dag
21a6('bum): ber skul pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan kang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka'
21a7('bum): bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams skom pa yin/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems
21a8('bum): can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams skom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs/ 
21b1('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skus pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan kang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod/ 
21b2('bum): cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang myi 'jigs pa nas sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin
21b3('bum): sems can gzhan gang myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'a sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par
21b4('bum): rig pa 'a bzhi'i la yang dag par skul ba yin/ se so yang da dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzha dan kang sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa de dag gi leg
21b5('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar pyod pa yin/ bdag kyang bya mas pa chen po sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/ byams pa chen po 'i legs
21b6('bum): pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po smos pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar 'khyod pa yin/ bdag kyang snying rje chen po skom pa yin/ gzhan yang snying rje chen
21b7('bum): bo la yang dag par skul ba yin/ snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems cad gzhan kyang snying rje chen po sgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar myod pa yin/ bdag
21b8('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brkyad sgom pa yin/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la yang dag par skul pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod
22a1('bum): yin/ sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
22a2('bum): 6gnyis sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul pa yin/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/ sems can gzhan yang
22a3('bum): myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu Na gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar spyod pa yin/ bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu sgrub pa yin/ gzhan yang dpe' byad bzang po brgyad
22a4('bum): rdul yang dag par skus pa yin/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'i legs pa brjod pa yin sems can gzhan gang dpe byad pa zang po phyas shA pa de gi shes pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar
22a5('bum): spyod pa yin// rab 'byor da gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji/ bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/ rab tu yang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings stond par myi 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed par myi 'gyur/ 
22a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag par byed par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin bar du yang de bzhin pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a8('bum): chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i chethabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings stonang to// sems can rnams kyi don tu byang chub sems rapa'i khyad pa myod
22b1('bum): sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed do/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mnye ba nyid du stan bI le'u ste
22b2('bum): drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / / shes rab gi 'a ro la du phyi nga stong phrag rgya bam po gnyis pa'o// 
22b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te/ sems can yang zhi nad tu dmyig sa
22b4('bum): su ma mchis la sems can tu dmyigs su yang ma mchi sa na/ su'i don tu byang chub sems dpa' sem das dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa bsgom pa
22b5('bum): lags/ de skad ces gsos pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis tshe dang ldan pa raba'abyor da la 'di skad sa bkalasaHla to// rab 'byor da byang chub sems
22b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom ste/ rab 'byor dkal te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ sems can ki mtha'
22b7('bum): yang gzhan yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
22b8('bum): sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom ste/ shes rab kyi pha
23a1('bum): ro sa tu byinang pas rlom pa'i byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa myed pam sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mthal la 'god do// 
23a2('bum): gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ka lad te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags sems can gi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par
23a3('bum): 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das ga lad te yang dag pa'i mtha' lnga yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur na ni/ des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la
23a4('bum): ni rang bzhin ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinadad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yang dag pa'i
23a5('bum): mtha' la 'god pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka lasaHlad pa/ rab 'byor da yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur pa yang myed na/ rang bzhin la
23a6('bum): rang bzhin la gnas par 'gyur ba myed na/ 'o nad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i
23a7('bum): mtha' la 'god do// yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar
23a8('bum): na sems can gi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su byed de gnyis su byar myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
23b1('bum): tu phyi nang pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems cadan rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'jug par myi babyed pa de lta bu'i thabs kang lags
23b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' cald pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
23b3('bum): sems cad rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'akod do/ sbyin pa sa rab tu bkod nas sbyin pa de'i thog ma dang / tha ma'i mtha' dang / dbus stond te/ ji ltar sbyin pa de'i tho ka ma yang stong/ tha ma'i mtha' yang / 
23b4('bum): stong / dbus kyang stong pa/ de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang stong / sbyin pa dag kyang stong / le nad pa yang stong par ston cing / rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' la don de
23b5('bum): dag gis sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu ya da kazhan no snyam du sems shig/ sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ lend pa yang gzhan no// snyam du ma sems shig
23b6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod nas sbyin pa yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no snyam du myi sems sbyin bdag kyang gzhan le nad pa yang gzhan no snyam du myi sems pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud
23b7('bum): ci dang / bdud mi la 'bras bu dang / mtha rang bdud pir 'gyur te/ sbyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzind cig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
23b8('bum): su ma 'dzind cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pas stong ngo // de'i 'bras bu yang 'bras bus stong ngo // sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis stong ngo // sen pa
24a1('bum): lend pas stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa myi dmyigs sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / sbyin bdag dang / lend pa myi dmyigs so// de mi'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
24a2('bum): 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shi nad tu stong ngo zhes brjod do// gzhan yang rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems
24a3('bum): can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/ tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ ma byind par le nad pa spongs la/ ma byind par lend pa las phyir
24a4('bum): ldog par gyis shig/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la 'dod pas log par g.yes pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rdzun tu smra ba spongs la/ rdzun tu smra bas
24a5('bum): phyir lce ldog par gyis shis phra ma spongs pa phra ma la sa phyir rtsi ldog par gyis shig/ zhe gcod pa spongs la/ zhe ga cod pa'i tshig las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ tshig rgyal spongs
24a6('bum): ya tshig khyal ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ chags sems spongs la chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ gnod sems spongs la gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ 
24a7('bum): thog par lta ba spongs la log par lta bas phyir ldog par gyis shis/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag la je ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhi gang yang byed kyis/ rigs kyi bu mom pa dang / 
24a8('bum): gang gi ma thos gcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang / gang gis gcod par bya ba'i des bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yis/ gangs byin par thang ba dang / ngas kyi dang bla ma me nad par btags pa dang / gang kyis thas
24b1('bum): de lta zhu'i chos ku ba nig yin/ gam 'dod pas log par g.yas pa dang / 'dod pas log par gsas par btags pa dang / kad kyis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang kang zhig yin
24b2('bum): dang brdzun tu smra ba dang // brdzun tu smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis brdzun tu smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyi rig yin/ kang phra ma dang phra mar smra bar btags pa dang / gang gis pra sA smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang
24b3('bum): gang zhig yin/ kang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / zhe gcod par btags pa dang / kang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/ kang gis tshig khyal pa smra ba dang tshig khyal bar btags
24b4('bum): pa dang / gang gis tshig khyal pa smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang kar zhig yin// cha gas sems skyed pa dang / chags sems su pata gas pa dang / gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos
24b5('bum): kyang zhig yin/ kang gnod sems su bskyed pa dang / gnod sems su btags pa dang / kad kyis gnod sems su bya ba de lta bu'i chos kya ga zhig yin/ ka log par lta ba dang / 
24b6('bum): log par lta bar btags pa dang / gang gis log par mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes stond cing / tshul khrims la 'god de// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
24b7('bum): po zabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed do// des de la sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la
24b8('bum): bstand te/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstand tam/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas
25a1('bum): de la mngon par zhend par myi byed do// mngon par zhedad pa myed pas 'jug par myi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do// shes rab des kyang bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams
25a2('bum): cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de yang 'jig rtend kyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid ka
25a3('bum): la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes de lta bu'i chos kang yang myi dmyigs te/ de'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
25a4('bum): ba nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can phan tshun gnod sems shing / 'khrug par gyur
25a5('bum): pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na 'di skad du 'dems shing stond te/ rigs kyi bu bzod pa sbubs shing / bzod pa sgoms shika/ nges pa dang sems zhi ba dang // dang dung sems pa'i ngang tshul
25a6('bum): can du gyis shig/ gang gnod par byed pa dang / gang kyis gnod par bya ba dang / gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyis rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni
25a7('bum): su song/ gnod par ni su la bya/ cis ni gnod par bya soms dang / chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gis stong pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang myi stong par myi 'gyur te/ 
25a8('bum): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so// nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so// lha rnams kyis ma byas
25b1('bum): klu rnams kyi byas so// gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so// dri za rnams kyis ma byas so// lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so// nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so// myi 'am ci rnams kyis ma byas/ 
25b2('bum): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so sum bcu rtsa gsu kyi starnams kyis la byas so// mtshe ma dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
25b3('bum): dang / tshangs pa dang / dge rgyas dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin
25b4('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas te/ de ni rtag pa yA rang bzhin kyis stong pa'o// rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la yang gnodabar myi byed do// zhes nas/ rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub
25b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu la sbyor te/ 
25b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing / rim kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to// yang dag par skul lo/ yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga'
25b7('bum): bar byed do// gzhog go 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// de yang 'jig rtend kyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang / gang gyis
25b8('bum): thob par bya ba dang / gang thob par bya ba gang yang byed do// rab 'byor de 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi don tu
26a1('bum): gang zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de la sems can du dmyigs pa myed do// sems na du ka dkas pa dmyigs pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la chos thams cad
26a2('bum): ni sems can kyis dben pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus
26a3('bum): chung ba dag mthong na 'di ltar lus dang / sems kyi btson 'grus la yang dag par skul te/ rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni/ chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ gang la zhum zhing
26a4('bum): le lor 'gyur ba 'am/ kad kyis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur pa 'am/ gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de/ chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid las myi 'da'
26a5('bum): pa yin gyis lus dang sems kyi batshon 'grus bskyed la le/ lo 'or te/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan
26a6('bum): nam/ shes rab bas// nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong
26a7('bum): pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid das/ dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid de rang ba'i stong pa nyid de chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang kyi mtshan
26a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
26b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sas/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags
26b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
26b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin
26b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam myi 'jigs pa rnams yam ka so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la
26b5('bum): botshon par gyis shig rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa myed par rtogs shing / sgrib pa myed pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang myed do zhes rab 'byor
26b6('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnam sa la rang bzhin stong pa nyid du yang dag par stonod to// yang
26b7('bum): dag par skul lo// yang dag par gzeng stod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// gzhog go/ 'dul lo// rab tu 'god do// ci nas kyang gnyid myi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
26b8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gnyis su myed pa'i chos ni gang la yang gnas pa myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
27a1('bum): ra' tu phyi nga pa sa yod pa'i thabs ma'am pas sems can rnams rang bzhir stong ba nyid kyi brtson 'grum la 'dasas shing rjes su gan // chu rigs kyi bu sbyin pa / nus rnamam
27a2('bum): bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nas/ shes rab bam// nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ 
27a3('bum): don das pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam
27a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ 
27a5('bum): dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam yang dag par spong ba rnams sam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams pas
27a6('bum): stobs rnams sam byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam sa sam/ bsam gtan rnams sas/ tshad myed pa nas
27a7('bum): mam gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sas/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang
27a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs
27b1('bum): pa rnams mas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sas/ yang na byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshon 'grus chom la tsam de dag gnyis pa
27b2('bum): yang yid la ma byed cig/ phyi gnyis par yang med la ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gis stong pa 'o/ rang bzhim stong pa nyid ni gnyis par mings bya ba pa yin/ phyi gnyis
27b3('bum): yang yid la bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid
27b4('bum): la yongs su sbyind par byed de// yongs su smyin par byas nas ri gyi rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do// phyir phyi 'ong ba'i
27b5('bum): 'bras bu la 'akod do// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do// rang byang chub la 'god do// lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do/ bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do/ 
27b6('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can sems gsang ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes
27b7('bum): pu ston te/ chur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin snyoms shig/ g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi 'du shes ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ 
27b8('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba 'am/ me gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dbyigs su byed do// khyod ting nge 'dzind de la gnas te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sa kyang na/ lus dang / 
28a1('bum): ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i chos gang ci yang byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba 'am/ tshus khrims srung ba 'am/ bzod pa sgom pa 'am/ brtson 'grum chom pa 'am/ 
28a2('bum): nge 'dzin skyed dam/ shes rab smos pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid la khyod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid la myong la spyod de phyi nang stong pa nyid la myong ba spyod de/ spong ba nyid stong pa nyid la spyod de/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dpa
