28a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'apyod de 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la khyod de thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid la spyod dpa dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyodapa
28a4('bum): rang ba'in stong pa nyid la spyod de chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod das myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la stod/ de dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la khyod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
28a5('bum): nyid la myong dam dngos po skyed pa'i ngo ma nyid stong pa nyid la khyod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la khyong ngam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la myong dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi dang / 
28a6('bum): pa rnams la khyod dam dbang po rnams la spyod dam/ stobs rnams la spyod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la khyod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la khyod dam 'phags pa'i bded
28a7('bum): brnams la gyod dang / bsam gtan rnams pa kyang dam chang byed pa rnams la spyod dam / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams la khyod dang / rnam par b.rad pa rnamams kyod dam
28a8('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul spyod dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la pyod dam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la khyod dam
28b1('bum): la kyang dam/ sangs rgyas kyi ram ma 'dres pa saco brgya pa khyod da/ bya 'on ma'i sasan sus bcu gnyes la da dam/ des byang babang po brgyad tshul gyo dang zapa kyi sa kyang
28b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la phyir das/ byang chub kyi sems ra 'i lam la khyod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi las la kyong dam tu dang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus khyong dang da cig
28b3('bum): 'ab ba'i 'bras su la spyod dam/ phyid bya'a' ba'i 'bras byod pa// bcom pa nyid pa khyod das/ rang byang myor marnamamams cad pa byed pa pa nyid
28b4('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su skyed par bya ba sa spyod dam/ sangs sus kyini pa songs su dag par bya bas khyod kyang ru ste/ dge pa'i tsha pa de dag las gror chung dus 'grub par 'gyur ma na sa 'ad sa
28b5('bum): rnas su ma dzir par byang chub sems dpa' lams dpa med pa zhesar kyi sa sa tu phyin pas byang ba bams sa sems pa dngas kyi byed do/ sa bya'i
28b6('bum): b.laskyeng ba ras rtse bar 'azu / 'amangs las palas kyi byed par gyi cur kye/ dge ba sams ca rtsala'i semams can rnams kyi dang byeng de// mangs rgyam pa la 'as ma pa sa/ 
29a1('bum): chub semams dpa'i lam la gyod dam sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la pyod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/ phyir myi 'ong
29a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la pyod dam dgra bcom pa nyid la pyod dam/ rang byang chub la gyod dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod dam/ sems can thams cad yongs su smyind par bya ba la spyod dam
29a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i chos de dag las gron chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su stonang te/ rab 'byor nga de ltar byang chub sems dang
29a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas
29a5('bum): rab 'ga' yang las kyi byed par myi 'gyur gi dge ba'i thos cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par bsnyen
29a6('bum): bkur byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
29a7('bum): bar sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du yang rnam par chud kyi za ste/ rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par rnam par gzungs thob cing / lus kyi dbang po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi
29a8('bum): dbang po mya nyam pa yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shind tu bsgoms pas/ rnam pa
29b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shi nad tu bsgoms pa de lam thams cad shi nad tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/ sangs
29b2('bum): rgyas kyi lam shi nad tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud myi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shi nad tu sgom par 'gyur
29b3('bum): te'arnam par smyind pa las 'byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rna ba thos na mkhyen pa nyid las kyang yongs su myi nyam mo
29b4('bum): rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhi na stong pa nyid la gnas shing / thabs mkhas pas ses
29b5('bum): can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
29b6('bum): ka nas shing sems can shes rab 'chal pa can blo chung ba rnams mthong na 'di skad 'dems shing rjes su stond te/ tshur rigs kyi bu lus sam/ ngag kam/ yid kyi las gang ji snyed byed kyang rung
29b7('bum): se de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gtogs shig dang / khyod kyi las de thams cad bdud ci'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bcur cir 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig
29b8('bum): bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su nyam par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur zhing / rang bzhin stong
29'a1('bum): par bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos zos pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
29'a2('bum): chub mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du yang rnam par chud myi za ste/ rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par gzungs thob cing / lus kyi dbang po 'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi dbang po
29'a3('bum): phyi nyam pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid shinang tu bsgoms pas/ rnam pa thams cad
29'a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du bsgoms pa de las thams cad shi nad tu bsgom sa par 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi lam lam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'am/ sangs rgyas
29'a5('bum): kyi lam shi nad tu bsgoms par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa da nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud myi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang zhi nad
29'a6('bum): tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/ rnam par smyind pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed na/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
29'a7('bum): pa nyid las kyangayongs su myi nyam mo// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas ni
29'a8('bum): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
29'b1('bum): gnam zhi shes rab 'chas pa can tho chung ba rnams mthong na 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su stonang te/ chur rigs kyi bu lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi kham ga sa rung ste/ de thams cad rang
29'b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid du rtogs shika dang / khyod kyis las de thams cad bdud cha'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ka 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am du / @
29'b3('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang sangapa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir len/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyam par gyi 'gyur zhing/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni yongs su nyam pa'i chos ka pa yang myed
29'b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ci zhig yongs
29'b5('bum): su nyes par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnaMs
29'b6('bum): la 'dems shing rjes su stond to// de ltar 'dems shing rjes su stond te/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs pa yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin
29'b7('bum): gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par blangs shing kan gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ 
29'b8('bum): bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas tra swa dag sa shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag
30a1('bum): pa nyid las yongs su nyam pa'i chos kar yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin// 
30a2('bum): chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs
30a3('bum): mdzes par sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su stond to// de la ra la 'dems shing rjes su stond pa'i tshe/ nam yang rjes su ma bsgrubs yin/ de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par
30a4('bum): blangs shing gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/ 
30a5('bum): gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gan sa par yang dag dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin// gzhan
30a6('bum): yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag
30a7('bum): par skul pa yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa yang dag par sprul ba yin/ bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms pa
30a8('bum): 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang pham gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul
30b1('bum): ba yinabadag kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par snying rje la gnas
30b2('bum): pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par snying rje sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par dka' ba la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par
30b3('bum): dga' ba sgom pa la yang dag par sprul pa yin bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par btang snyoms slom pa la yang dag par
30b4('bum): skul ba yin bdag kyang rtag tu nam mkha' mtha' ya Tas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms pa
30b5('bum): 'jug pa la yang dag par sprul pa yin/ bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms pa ra 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas
30b6('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par sprul ba yon/ bdag kyang cung zad byed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang cung zad myed pa'i
30b7('bum): mjed kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par stsal ba yin/ bdag kyang 'du shes byed 'du shes byed sbyin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ gzhan yang 'du shes byed
30b8('bum): 'du shes byed sbyin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par stsal ba yin/ bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin da pa la yang dag
40a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ka dgas pa yang myi dmyigs rangab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs
40a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ 
40a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang phyi dmyigs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa
40a4('bum): yang myi dmyigs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs dran pa nye bar kazhag pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang kyi
40a5('bum): dmyigs yang dag par spong ba rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
40a6('bum): dbang po rnaMs kyi myi dmyigs dbang po rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs stobs rnams su gdags pa yang myi dbyigs byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang kyi
40a7('bum): dmyigs byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang myi dmyigs 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
40a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs bsam gtan rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs
40b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
40b2('bum): su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs rnam par tha dad pa rnams su ka dkas pa yang myi dmyigs/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs
40b3('bum): mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yang myi dmyigs/ rnam par tha dad pa'i
40b4('bum): ske stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / spond pa myed par kang gas pa yang myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang myi dmyi kas/ mngon par shes pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi
40b5('bum): dmyigs ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang myi dmyigs ting ngedzi nad rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs gzungs kyi sgo na/ mas kyang myi dmyigs gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags
40b6('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang myi dmyigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ 
40b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ byams pa chen po yang myi
40b8('bum): dmyigs byams pa chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po yang myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen por gdags pa yang myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang myi dmyigs
41a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chum sa 'dres pa bco bgyud cu ga gas pa sa kyi gas// drun tu zhugs pa 'phrus byas dashA tu zhun pa 'as ba na
41a2('bum): yan cig phyim 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang kyi dbyigs ya rang cig phyir lo ba'i 'bras bum gdags pa yang phyi dmyigs phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bral bu sa gyi byi pa phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gang rnam pa su gyi byin
41a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dbyigs dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dbyigs rang byang chub kyang kyi dmyigs rang byang chub tu gdags pa yang myi dmyigs las kyi rnam bzhes pa nyid kyang kyi dbyin pa
41a4('bum): lam kyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid du gdags pa yang myi dbyigs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myi dbyigs rnam pa khams cad mkhyedad pa nyid du gdags pa yang gyi dmyig sa/ 
41a5('bum): phyi chen mo'i mtshan sum chu ba gnyis kyang kyi dbyigs chen pa'i mtshas sus 'acu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa yang kyi byi dpa' byang bzang po bcung bcu mang gyi dbyin
41a6('bum): dpa' kyang bzang po brgyad 'thur gdags pa yang kyi dbyigs na/ than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma la sdom pa bar 'gyur 'gas pa 'ang/ rab 'byor 'dis ste dbenas/ de 'di
41a7('bum): gshegs pa'i phus pa'i dge zong sa dge mongs / dge bsnyen nas/ dge bzhes sam sasad pabye ba bag zhig 'argyathong dum brgyad du rtul ba nad/ ram byung de'i nyam dumam
41a8('bum): grab das dang/ sachung zugs pa'i thal pa nges su ba par 'gyur ba kyi kyi ma 'i la kyi 'i
41b1('bum): chub zam/ zan byed pas bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba sor dam/ gso lang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos po sa
41b2('bum): mchi mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sanas pa/ rab 'byor nga de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad dngos po skyed na/ sems can gang 'ag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
41b3('bum): d+hAd tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ man cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid das / rang byang chub pas/ tha ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
41b4('bum): dani mar gyi'o/ kazhan can byedan mi mag gis yongs su brim pa'i sbre sa dag phyi da ci ga myed pa sa gzha gso// 'dus pa rab tu 'gad de/ byin kyisog napa yin pa de sa brten
41b5('bum): tshulas byung ba'i phyir/ phyi da ci log ma yin pa ste/ rnam bar rtog pa skyed pa'i phyir mi log ma yin pa'o// gang la phyinang ci log byed pa de la bdag byed do// sems can myed de/ 
41b6('bum): bron byed do/ 'gro babyed do// gsol babyed do// thus bu byed do// gang zag myed de/ shi can myed do// gad bdag myed do// byed pa pa byed de/ tshom ma babyed de/ shes pa la byed / mthabs po skyed de
41b7('bum): ras gzugs skyed do// tshor bskyed do// 'ashes byed do// 'du byed myang nga/ rnam par shes pa myod / des phyig kyang ngo // nam byed du/ 'gyur da/ bu rtsang do// sum myed dang / ming byed do// 
41b8('bum): sa gtsun pa byed nga / shA kyang ngo/ byang mung 'og byed da / chob byed do// des kyig kyi rnam par gas pa myong ngo // na pa'i rnam par shes pa byed da/ sna'i rnam par gos pa myong nga / 
42a1('bum): rnam par shes pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// de la myig kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// snga'i 'dus te
42a2('bum): reg pa myed do// sde'i 'dus te reg pa myed do sus kyi yul te ga pabyed do yad kyi gus te reg pa myed do// de la myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// sna'i 'dus
42a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed do// 
42a4('bum): de la sa'i khams myed do// chu'i khams myed do// mye'i kham sa myed do// rlung kyi khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// de la ma rig pa myed
42a5('bum): 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// bying dang gzu kas myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do/ 
42a6('bum): skye ba myed do// rga shi myed do// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyinang
42a7('bum): ba myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyidad pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myed do// de ba dang stong pa nyid byed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong
42a8('bum): pa nyid myed do// chen po stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus su byas stong pa nyid myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do// thog ma dang
42b1('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed
42b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do// 
42b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lago brgyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa 'a
42b4('bum): rnams myed do// bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha dad pa brgyad myed do// mthar
42b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams myed do/ 
42b6('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed do// byams pa
42b7('bum): chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do// de la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// phyir myi 'ong
42b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// / 
43a1('bum): shas dum bu tha ma/ pham pa gsum pa// / ka la gzugs myed pa dang / tshor ba myed pa dang
43a2('bum): 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du byed myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / gdu myig myed pa dang / rna ba myed pa dang / snga myed pa dang / lce myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / yid myed pa dang / gang
43a3('bum): la gzugs byed pa dang / sgra byed pa dang / tri myed pa dang / ro myed pa dang / reg myed pa dang / chos myed pa dang // ganga' myig kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / 
43a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa s+yed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa dang // ka pa la myig gi 'dus te/ 
43a5('bum): reg pa myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed padang / sus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
43a6('bum): te reg pa myed pa dang // gapa la myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenard kyis tshor ba myed pa
43a7('bum): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reka pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba byed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa dang / kapal sa'i kham
43a8('bum): myed pa dang / chu'i khams myed pa dang / mye'i khams byed pa dang / rlud kyi khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang // gang la ma rig pa myed pa dang
43b1('bum): 'du byed byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / myi dang gzugs myed pa dang / skye mched drug myed pa dang / reg pa myed pa dang / tshor bskyed pa dang / sred pa myed pa dang / lend pa myed pa dang / srid pa skyed
43b2('bum): pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / rga shi myed pa dang // gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa dang / brtson
43b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyi rang pa myed pa dang / bsam gtad kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa byed pa dang // gas dang stong pa nyid byed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myed pa
43b4('bum): dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skyed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myed pa dang / don ngas pa// pab nyid myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa dang / 
43b5('bum): 'dus pa byas 'ang ba nyid byed pa dang / mtha' las 'das slobapa nyid byed pa dang / thog sa dang bas myed pa stong pa nyid byed pa dang / dang 'askyed pa stong pa nyid byeng ba dang / rang bdir
43b6('bum): bapa nyid byed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid byed pa dang / rang kyim can nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / myi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid byed pa dang / dngab po byed pa thong pa nyid byed pa dang / ngal
44a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams par skyed pa dang / tshad byed pa rnams byed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams myed pa dang / gang la rnam par tharang pa brgyang myed pa dang / mthar kyis kan
44a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku myed pa dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams myed pa dang
44a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed pa dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed pa dang / byams pa chen po myed pa dang / 
44a4('bum): snying rje chen por myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed pa dang // de la rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed padang
44a5('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myed pa dang rang kyang chus byed pa dang gangs lums ca dge ba nyid da lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
44a6('bum): byang chub myed pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la khyor cing / mes
44a7('bum): can phyi nga kyi log tu gyurd pa rnams sems cad kyi 'du shes las 'grel te/ gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'grelang to// gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes las 'grel te/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
44a8('bum): thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to// gang bag l+le'i chos 'di lta ste/ dra pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i rang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 
44b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yas lag brgyang pa dang / rnam par ma dad pa'i na gsum dang / 'phags pa'i bdam pa pazhi dang / rnam pam sa pa brgyad dang / mabar da kyis gas
44b2('bum): pa'i rnabs par 'jug par gu dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgomams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / gyi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / ma la yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang / 
44b3('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don dam pa'i bden pa gang yin pa de lta bu ma yin te/ 'di ltar 'dus pa byas dang / ma lus pa dang
44b4('bum): dngom po byed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa de'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/ des bdag myed do// mams can myed do// srog myeng do/ 
44b5('bum): byed do// gamol ba skyed do// skyes bu byed do// gang bag myed dol/ shed can myed do// keng bdag byed do// byed pa po myed do// tshor ba po byed do// zhem la zo khyed do// mthong ba po myed
44b6('bum): byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa byed do// myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu rad kyis tshor ba snyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang kyis tshor ba myed do// sna'i lus
44b7('bum): chog gi lus te ga pabyed do// na pa'i yub tereg pa byed do// sna'i yus te ga pa byed do// sgo'i 'dus te reg pa byed do/ lus kyi 'dus te rog paskyed do// yid kyi lus te reg sa byed do/ 
45a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do// sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis sor ba skyed da sus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba byed da/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyim cho
45a2('bum): byed do// sa'i khams myed do// chu'i khams myed do// mye'i khams myed do// rlung gyi khams myed do// nam mkha'i khams myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// ma rig pa myed do// 
45a3('bum): 'du byed myed do// rnam par shes pa myed do// mying dang gzugs myed do// skye mched drug myed do// reg pa myed do// tshor ba myed do// sred pa myed do// lend pa myed do// srid pa myed do// skye ba myed do// 
45a4('bum): rga shi myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha'o/ yad tu phyind pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
45a5('bum): phyi rad pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mye dge ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed do// nang stong pa nyid myed do// phyi stong pa nyid myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed
45a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid byed do// thog pa dang tha ma byed
45a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid byed do// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid byed
45a8('bum): rang ma lo byed pa stobs nyid byed do// bam nyid phreng ba nyid myed do// dngos po byed pa'i chom nyid slobapa nyid byed ngo // dran pa nye ba gnag pa rnams byed do// yang ngan par spong ba dam pamyod de/ 
45b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed do// dbang po rnams myed do// stobs rnams myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed
45b2('bum): ro'o/ bsam gtan rnams myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang
45b3('bum): myed do// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// de ba'i
45b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myed do// byams pa chen po myed do// snying rje chen po myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
45b5('bum): brgyad myed do// myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis myed do/ dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cu myed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa 'i 'bras bu myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
45b6('bum): myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid myed do// rang byang chub myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myedado rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed do// byang chub
45b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa nas lam gyi don tu/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa myed do// rang bzhin s+ho/ 
45b8('bum): pa nyid de yang snga nas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ phyin cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ bar du yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ de nas yang rang bzhin gyis kyi stong pa ma yin no// de bas na byang chub
46a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod cing / sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems cas sa kyi 'du shes yongs su dgrom
46a2('bum): ba'i phyir/ lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do// de las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang / lam
46a3('bum): thams cad la khyod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyinang par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ rje'i
46a4('bum): 'du byed byid kyis brlabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de tha ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
46a5('bum): sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyi rgyun myi gcod do// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/ 'das pa'i dus
46a6('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
46a7('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ daltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig tend kyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji ltar bzhugs zhi 'tsho myong ba
46a8('bum): de dag kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rab pazhin stong pa nyid de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par gzhan las 'jig rtend kyi khams su 'byung bar gyi 'gyur/ 
46b1('bum): de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la kyang bar bya ste/ des myong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri/ rnam pa thams cad
46b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid las yongs su nyam par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad
46b3('bum): la gyod cing // gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du shes kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
46b4('bum): 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// rnam par shes pa yang gzhan do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang kazhan gyis kyang gzha ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang kazhan ro// 
46b5('bum): rna ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// spebagazhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ lus
46b6('bum): ngakazhan ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// yid kyang kazhan ro/ rang ba'in stong pa nyid kyang gzhad do// gzugs kyang gzhas so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhang / zla yang gnan no/ 
46b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// rjes pa gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ro sa gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// reg kyang ga' ro/ rang ka'idi stong pa nyid kyang / 
46b8('bum): ka'ang ro// chos kyang gzhan 'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan do// byig kyi rnam pam shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i rnam par shes mas pan nar ro / rang
47a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid gzhan no// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
47a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kying gzhan no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myig kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang
47a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te
47a4('bum): reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa
47a5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan no// myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba yang bzhin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no/ 
47a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan no// 
47a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cho na do// sid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sang gzhan ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// 
47a8('bum): sa'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chu'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mye'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
47b1('bum): rlud kyi khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhang ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ 
47b2('bum): kyang gzhan no// ma rig pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'du byed kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par shes pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
47b3('bum): gzhan no// mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// skye mched drug kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// reg pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
47b4('bum): gzhan no// tshor ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshar ba yang gzhan na gzhan sred pa gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
47b5('bum): len pa yang gzhan ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ srid pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no skye ba yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhadan
47b6('bum): ni yang gnar/ rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyang ka' so// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyid pa yang ga'ang ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rosang tu phyird pa yang ga'ang mo rang
47b7('bum): bzhim stong pa nyid kyang gzhanan/ bzod pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa yang gzhad no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzhan no// bcon 'grus kyi pha rol du phyidad pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang gzhadan
47b8('bum): thamam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga'ang ro// shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyinang pa yang gzha ro// rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma// dang stong pa nyid tu na / 
48a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyi nang stong pa
48a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// don dam
48a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
48a4('bum): kyang gzhan no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
48a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rab kyi mtshan nyid stong
48a6('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
48a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bo 'i stong pa nyid kyang gzhon rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
48a8('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// drang pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no// rang
48b1('bum): bzhi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// stobs rnams kyang
48b2('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong
48b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// tshad myed pa rnams
48b4('bum): kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par tha dad pa brgyad
48b5('bum): kyang gzhan no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju ka pa dgu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
48b6('bum): smond pa myed pa yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin
48b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyi 'dzin
48b8('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang kazhan no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// byams pa chen po yang gzhan no// rang bzhin
49a1('bum): stong pa nyid gzhan no// snying rje chen po yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// 
49a2('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang
49a3('bum): gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang byang chub kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// las kyi
49a4('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myed gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong
49a5('bum): pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi bgyid kyi// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzu gos so// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
49a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid don ba'i stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang ra ba'i sgo nyid do// rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid/ 
49a7('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid kyang rang ba'ir stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig go/ rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhir stong pa nyid do/ 
49a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snga'o// sde nyid kyang rang bzhir stong pa nyid do// rang bzhir stong pa nyid sre'o// lus nyid kyang rang ba'i
49b1('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang rang bzhid stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzug
49b2('bum): so// sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid smra'o// dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tri'o// ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang ba'i na stong pa nyid
49b3('bum): kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhi
49b4('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig kyi rnam par she/ sa pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid na da sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
49b5('bum): ba'i stong pa nyid kyang lnga'i rnam pa ga de'i par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhir byung ba nyid do// rab bzhi nyid kyang kye'i rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ lus kyi dam
49b6('bum): shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rna rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rna
49b7('bum): par shes pa'o// myig kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
49b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te ren/ 
49b9('bum): nan stong pa nyid kyang snga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid do/ 
50a1('bum): bzhen sto nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid ngo
50a2('bum): pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// 
50a3('bum): myig kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig kyi 'dus te reka pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang ra
50a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snga'i 'dus
50a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor ba nyid kyang stso mo 'dus te reg pa'i rgya dad kyis tshar ba'o rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i
50a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
50a7('bum): kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang
50a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// mye'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
50a9('bum): bya'i khams lo chung kyi khams nyi ba kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang ba'is stong pa nyid kyang chud kyi khams so dam po'i'i pa 'i kyang rang ba'i sa song ba nyid do// rang bzhir stong pa nyid kying
50b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
50b2('bum): pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// na par she pa 'i kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyang ni par shes pa'o mying dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
50b3('bum): dol rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ 
50b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
50b5('bum): sred pa'o// lend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// srid pa 'i bya shin stong nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid khyod srid pa'o skye ba nyid kyangab rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang
50b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga ni 'o / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyidang pa'o// tshul khrims kyi
50b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bzad pa' pha ra lad tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
50b8('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu
51a1('bum): gzhan no// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang byang chub kyang gzhan
51a2('bum): nol/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
51a3('bum): no'o zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par myi byed kyi// gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
51a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang rang ba bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du bye de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
51a5('bum): kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa
51a6('bum): nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snga'o// sde nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
51a7('bum): do/ rang ba'i na mangs nyid kyang sde'o// sum nyid kyang rang bzhimathong pa nyid do// rang bani mangs nyid kyang lus so bad nyid kyang rang bzhi song ba nyid do// rang bzhi mongs nyid kyang sa dang / kanas
51a8('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sla'o// dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin spong
51b1('bum): nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg go chos nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do
51b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhi
51b3('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang na ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snga'i rnam par shes pa'o// sde'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
51b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ 
51b5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang
51b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong
51b7('bum): pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sde'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid
51b8('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// 
51'a1('bum): phyi nang pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang ba'i na stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa nyid kyang
51'a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
51'a3('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 
51'a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang na pa stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
51'a5('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyi da do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus
51'a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kya phu pa bzhir stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las
51'a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog pa dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang ba'i stong pa nyid do// 
51'a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
51'b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa
51'b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do rA bzhi stong pa 'i kyang ngo bo ldi sngo pa nyid dngos po myed 'i ngo bo ldi sde pa'i khya lnga ba'i stong pa nyid
51'b3('bum): bzhi stong pa tI kya dngos po mye bI te bo ldi tsA ba ny+dzi// drar pa nye rna pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong pa nyid kyang rang ba nyi dAr g+ha zham+b+ha pa rnams so// rdzu'
51'b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnas
51'b5('bum): so// stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan
51'b6('bum): bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bas mi gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed
51'b7('bum): ba rnam pa'o// gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid da / rang bzhin sto pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnam sa yo rnam par tharang pa nyid kyang rang ba'id
52a1('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar da kyis
52a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i
52a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzind nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa
52a4('bum): nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
52a5('bum): stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
52a6('bum): kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
52a7('bum): dol/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
52a8('bum): stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
52b1('bum): bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo
52b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcos pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// 
52b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang byang chub po/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang
52b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa/ rab 'byor
52b5('bum): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor dag lad te gzugs kyang gzhan la rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba yang gzhan la
52b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin
52b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// myig kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rna ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga
52b8('bum): lce yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// gzugs kyang gzhan
53a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan sgra la dka' na la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tri yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ro yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong
53a2('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan reg kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
53a3('bum): gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin
53a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 
53a5('bum): myig kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la
53a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yid kyi 'dus
53a7('bum): te reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
53a8('bum): zas gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan sa/ 
53b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa
53b2('bum): gzhan sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mye'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
53b3('bum): rlung gi khams kyang gzhan yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
53b4('bum): ma rig pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
53b5('bum): mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzha na skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan/ reg pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
53b6('bum): na tshor bas gzhan sa/ rang ba'id stong pa nyid kyang gzham med pa yang gzhan la gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzham yin pa yang gzhams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ku' du
53b7('bum): pa 'angs nyid kyang gan ma ka' sa nyid kyang ka' ni sna ga'anarab pa'i dmas nyid kyang ka'ang/ srid pa
53b8('bum): ra kyi dang pa yang gnanas rang bzhi stong pa nyid kyang gzhang tshul khrims kyi pha 'ol tu phyidad pa yang gzhanas rang bzhin stob pa nyid kyang ga'am/ bzod pa'i pha ros dasu phyir pa yang gzhams
54a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa yang gzhan la
54a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ga'an/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi stong pa nyid
54a3('bum): kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong
54a4('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong
54a5('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
54a6('bum): thog sa dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid kyang ka'an la/ rang ba'in stong pa nyid kyang gzhang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzham la
54a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
54a8('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ 
54b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ 
54b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
54b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan
54b4('bum): la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
54b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rnam par thard pa brgya da kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ mthar kyis
54b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa
54b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ting nge 'dzind nams kyang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan/ 
54b8('bum): larang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
55a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan byams pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan snying rje chen po yang gzhan sa
55a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kya
55a3('bum): gzhan/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ 
55a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rang byang chub kyang gzham la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam pa thams
55a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan te// ka lad te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig/ ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
55a6('bum): yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da kang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
55a7('bum): zo gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa
55a8('bum): zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong
55b1('bum): bas ra de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar/ 
55b2('bum): gsad te 'du zhes rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang
55b3('bum): kyi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
55b4('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
55b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor/ dgar kyi phyir 'du byed rang bzhin kyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong
55b6('bum): ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ka lang te rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub
55b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor de gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang
55b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
56a1('bum): kAl te phyag rang bzhin gis spong ba 'ag ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang thas myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya ste
56a2('bum): rab 'byor dkang gi phyir myig rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byig rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
56a3('bum): ro// galang rte na pa rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang kyi rgya ste/ rab 'acwo
56a4('bum): gang gi phyir na ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba rang bzhin gis stong ngo // zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag
56a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te sna rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par 'a
56a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor nga gang gi phyir snga rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snga rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
56a7('bum): khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te lce rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
56a8('bum): chen po yang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor nga gang gi phyir lce rang bzhin kyis stong pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
56b1('bum): bo lnga rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud bar byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// g.yang te sus rang bzhin kyis stong pa zhin/ 
56b2('bum): ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi skye ste/ rab 'byor nga kang gi phyir lus rang bzhin gis stong
56b3('bum): bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
56b4('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// ka la da te yid rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
56b5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang gi phyir yid rang bzhin gis stong pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po yid rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong
56b6('bum): du chud par byas shing / tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// kal te gzugs rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
56b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da kang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
56b8('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po gzugs rang bzhing gis stong po zhes bya bar khong du rung bar byas shing / tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gal te spa ba 'di
57a1('bum): kyis stong pa zhigs yin na si/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da kang
57a2('bum): gi phyir sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pas na // de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
57a3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te dri rang bzhin gis tong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
57a4('bum): 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang gi phyir tri rang bzhin gisastong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tri rang bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing
57a5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ka ya ta byang chub sems dpa'asam sa dpa' chen pa/ gal te ro rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin
57a6('bum): mni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa sa bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang kyi rgyu ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ro rang bzhin gis stong bas na de'i phyir byang
57a7('bum): chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po yo rang bzhin zhes stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// kal te reg rang ba'i
57a8('bum): shes stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang than myed par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub su mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang kyi rgya ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyim reg rang bzhi
57b1('bum): rang bzhin gis stong pas sa/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg rang bzhin gis stong po zhes bya bar khong du rung bar byas shing/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
57b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ga lad te chos rang bzhin kyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
57b3('bum): 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gad kyi phyir chos rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed
57b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te myig kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin kyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
57b5('bum): dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da kang kyi phyir myig kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na
57b6('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon para'
57b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te na ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhi gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
57b8('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par myi rgyaste/ rab 'byor dkad kyi phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po man pa'i rnam par zhes pa
58a1('bum): bzhin gis stong ngo zhes bya bar zhong tu chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis/ 
58a2('bum): stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor de gang gi phyir sna'i rnam par shes
58a3('bum): pa rang bzhin gis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
58a4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa
58a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da kang gi phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
58a6('bum): sems rapa' chen mo sde'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhidagis slong zhes bya bar 'ong du rung bar byas shing / zan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'angabargya'o// sa
58a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin zhes stong pa shig ma yis na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya lta
58a8('bum): rab 'byor dgang gi phyim lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'ang bzhir shes spong bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rnam pa ma shes pa rang bzhin shes ldang ngo zhes bya bar 'ong du rung bar gyur
58b1('bum): bla na myong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58b2('bum): chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ rab 'byor da gang gi phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gis stong pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
58b3('bum): dpa' chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gis stong ngo// zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing / bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te myig gi
58b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/
