176b6('bum): sam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind nams
176b7('bum): samagazungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs
176b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam
177a1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos gang yang yod dam ma rtogs shig ces 'dems shing / rjes su stond te nges byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang dmyigs pas mngon par zhend par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs te/ de la mngon par zhend pa myed pas chos gang yang
177a3('bum): skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol song gyi skye
177a4('bum): gnas pa'o// 'di no ke shin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni myi'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can
177a5('bum): nor 'di ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di
177a6('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par myi rtog ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
177a7('bum): gnam shing yi la rab kya phar yang tu pa dang pa la gnas gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no// rab 'byor dmi sa ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ces
177a8('bum): bo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag sa yo byad nas
177b1('bum): nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongasu ni ses na na dran pa nye gzhag pa pa'i gso/ drang pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su ba rang par gyur ra te/ rab 'byor de sa na byang chub

177b5('bum): rab 'byor da saran byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' byen sbyin pa'i pharo bang tu byid pa sa gnas shing / yang dag par rab bzhis sems car rnam sa sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor

177b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la yo byad nams nye bar bsgrub se yo byad de dag gis yongs su bi dang ba'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa pa'i skom so// rdzu 'phrus gi rkang pa pa'i snyoms pas
177b8('bum): 'khor ba las yongs su ba rang par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po sbyir ba'i la rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi sa mams can rnams sbyor

179a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'// 
179a2('bum): chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas 'khor ba
179a3('bum): las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rosad tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba
179a4('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po/ sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste2/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnaMs
179a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi snyoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par gyur da te/ rab 'byo rad de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khris
179a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
179a7('bum): gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs
179a8('bum): su zind pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgoms pas 'khor pa las yongs su tha rad par gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
179b1('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la
179b2('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams stobs
179b3('bum): lnga sbom mo stobs lnga snyoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lA la seMs
179b4('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems
179b5('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgru ba ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems
179b6('bum): can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun snyoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rang par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
179b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
179b8('bum): la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ 
180a1('bum): yo byad de dag kyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rang
180a2('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// 
180a3('bum): rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang
180a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zi nad pa'i sem sa can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi skom mo// dran pa
180a5('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi snyoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems rab la sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la kas
180a6('bum): shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba
180a7('bum): bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ so byad de dag gis yongs su zinang pa'i sems cad
180a8('bum): rnams yang dag par spong ba pa'i sbom mo yang dag par spong ba ba'i bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po bzod pa'i
180b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba cani la sems can rnam sbyar

180b4('bum): pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzo
180b5('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da'i ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol

180b7('bum): ste la/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga sgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
180b8('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la

181a1('bum): su zind pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga snyoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su b.rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de skar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
181a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor nga ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi
181a3('bum): yan lag 'dud pa sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chul lams dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems cad dag pa so byan rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ so byang de dgazhis songs su yinang pa mas sa
181a4('bum): sa kyang chub kyi yan lag 'du rnam sab kyilag 'dun mas / 'bar bsam sangs su kyi rnams mams las sa

181a6('bum): ra 'byor de sa byang chub sems dpa' lam pa dga' banas bzad pa'i maro sa gyi pa sa gnas nga sa pa sa parna sa

181b4('bum): rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems sa can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yo ngas su zind pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi

182b6('bum): po partson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas
182b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can dag la yo byad
182b8('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub stehaM/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i sgom mo/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thard par
183a1('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// 
183a2('bum): rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang

183a4('bum): bzhi sgoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thard par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang
183a5('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi
183a6('bum): rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrubs te/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zind pa'i seMs
183a7('bum): can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi

183b3('bum): pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la seMs

183b5('bum): sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga sgoms pa sa 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol
183b6('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor dade ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan
183b7('bum): lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zi nad pa'i sems can
183b8('bum): rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun snyoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
183'a1('bum): nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag kyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams dbang po rnams skom mo// dbang po rnams snyoms pas 'khor ba las yongs su thar da par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar
183'a2('bum): ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gnas shing / dbang po lnga sa sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
183'a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems na
183'a4('bum): dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/ stobs lnga snyoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab
183'a5('bum): 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stobs sA la sa mas can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub
183'a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183'a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun skom mo/ 
183'a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas 'khor pa las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang
183'b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
183'b2('bum): brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub
183'b3('bum): stel/ yo byad de dag kyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rlom so// 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha radang par
183'b4('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se rnams dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba
183'b5('bum): shes bam pa / rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod
183'b6('bum): cing / sems can 'gon myed pa sdug bsngal pa/ khams dang kos kyis 'phongs pa dag mthong na/ 'di sar yongs su sbyin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed chur sheg/ ngas kha zas dang gos dang / banod
183'b7('bum): bdang / mal sa dang / mi tog sa/ gdug shos dang / gas dang / 'beng ba dang / thug pa dang / gyis dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nong bu dang / mu tig dang / bye cu ca dang / rung dang / maman sa kyi rung
184a1('bum): gser dang / dadus dang / myi'i rkyen dang / so kyad kyang ji sa rung ba'i rin po 'i lnga bdun gyi bar nusams sems can rnams la phan thogs shig/ dani byengs sun mim par das pan padang
184a2('bum): bar 'byung nus 'di gar dang 'dod pa'i mi gyi bdan nas yin na snyam bams par bya'o// da 'di yadag kyis yun ring po rnas sems ca rnams kyi don su bslabs pa yin na zhesadesnyam
184a3('bum): kyis bdag shid rje yin par soms la sems can rnams la yongs su thong shig/ sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig/ bzod pa la sbyor cig/ brtson 'grus la sbyor dacig/ bsam gtan la sbyor da ci
184a4('bum): shes rab la sbyor bcig/ rang stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyor cig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyor da cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ chen po stong pa nyid la sbyor
184a5('bum): cig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyor dacig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyor cig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyoracig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ thog
184a6('bum): ma dpas ma byed pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor
184a7('bum): cig/ myi dmyigs stong pa nyid la sbyor da cig/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyor cig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyor cig/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyor cig/ dran pa nye bar gan
184a8('bum): po rnams la sbyor da cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor da cig/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyor cig/ dbang po rnams la sbyor da cig/ stobs rnams la spyor da cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
184b1('bum): spyor da cig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor da cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan rnams la sbyor da cig/ tshad myed pa rnams la sbyor cig/ gzugs myed pa'i
184b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor da cig/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod cig/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor cig/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
184b3('bum): smond pa myed pa la sbyor da cig/ mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor cig/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la sbyor da cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyor da cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor cig/ myi 'jigs
184b4('bum): ba bzhi la sbyor cig so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor cig/ snying rje chen pos sbyor cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sbyor cig/ de tsas kyis dga' bar sems par
184b5('bum): gong du 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa rnams la khod cig/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khod cig/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
184b6('bum): khong cig dgra bcom pa nyid la khong cig/ rang byang chub la khod cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la khod cig ces 'dems shing rjes su stonang to// rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dang
184b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su spyand par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smyind par byas pa rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su 'thar pa nas 'khor
184b8('bum): pa thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams 'di ltar yongs su smyin
184'a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
184'a2('bum): rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad nas
184'a3('bum): nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa snyoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs
184'a4('bum): su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ka/ nas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems
184'a5('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems
184'a6('bum): can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gyi
184'a7('bum): yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
184'a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184'b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi sa sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhes/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
184'b2('bum): gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gyis yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi snyoms pas 'khor ba
184'b3('bum): las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// 
184'b4('bum): rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di
184'b5('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad rnams tebar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag kyis yongs su zind pa'i sems
184'b6('bum): can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thard par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
184'b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
184'b8('bum): shing dbang po lA la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can dag la yo byad nas
185a1('bum): par bya'o// rkyend gang dang ma ldan pas khyed tshul khrims ngan pa byed par gyur pa'i rkyend de dag ngas khyed la shugs kyis zas dang / skom dang / kos dang bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / 
185a2('bum): gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / myi'i rkyend dang / 
185a3('bum): yo byad kang mi yang rung ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long la sems can rnams la phan thogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag
185a4('bum): la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te phan pa de lta bus pa na btags pas/ de dag gi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par \u0f7fngas shing gnas te/ de dag sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma zhig pa ma kod
185a5('bum): pa ma 'dres paskyon myed pa ma nyams pag/ rang dang pa yod pa/ mkhas pa sngags pas shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzi nang gi rgyur 'gyur ba la mkhas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
185a6('bum): la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ shes

185a8('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa

185b2('bum): nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa

185b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad myed pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dujug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la gnas/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyos
185b5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la gnas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin nams lal
185b6('bum): gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ mya 'jigs pa bzhi sa gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs
185b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rjes su thob par byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin
185b8('bum): pa la gnas shing / sems can sems 'khrugs pa dang / gnod sems su gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smyind par byed de/ rkyen kang dang ma ldan pas khyed gnod sems su byed par gyur pa'i
186a1('bum): rkyen de dag ras khyed la grags kyis/ zas dang / skom dang gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / khyim dang nor dang 'dra
186a2('bum): dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / myi'i rkye nad dang / yo byad kang ji yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar du long shig ces nas/ de bzod pa'i pha
186a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag bzod pa sgom mo/ 'khrug pa myed pa dang / gnod sems myed pa'i sems su gyur
186a4('bum): pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / spyi na ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ bco
186a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa gnas// nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la

186a7('bum): la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid

186b6('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di skar yongs su smind par byed de/ rkyend gang dang ma ldan pas/ khyed le lo byed par gyur par
186b7('bum): rkyend de dag ngas khyed la baishugs kyis/ zas dang / skom dang / kos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang /

187a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag brtson 'grus chom steng mi sa khyed yi sems kyis bzon 'grus com par gyur
187a2('bum): pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi/ 
187a3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas// nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la kan
187a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas// don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la kan sa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das

187b4('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can sems ga/ yengs par gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smyind par bye/ da de/ rkyend gang dang ma ldan pas khyed sems g.yengs par
187b5('bum): gyurd pa'i rkyend de dag ngas khyed la bshugs kyis/ zas dang skom da kos dang bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / ma tag dang / mal ma dang / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang
187b6('bum): byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dang / myi'i rkye nad dang / yo byad gang ji yang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gi
187b7('bum): bar du long shig ces nas/ de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas de dag bsam gtan sgom te/ seMs
187b8('bum): g.yeng ba myed cing mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa de dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha
188a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rosal tu phyinang pas gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gdas// rang spong ba nyidas
188a2('bum): pa gnas phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang spong ba nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ dong dam pa spong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sa gnas/ 'dus
188a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad
188a4('bum): stong ba nyid la gnas rA ki mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyil dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sa nas/ thob nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
188a5('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ dra pa nye bar gnag pa nas sa la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'grus kyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnam pa nam
188a6('bum): mnas/ badzin pa gas yi rnams sa gnas/ ting nge 'and nam sa sa/ gzungs kyi sgornams sa ga / de bzhi gshin na 'i ni
188b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor
188b2('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smyind par byas pa rnams ngan song
188b3('bum): gsum las yongs su 'thar nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro// rab 'byor dade gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
188b4('bum): shing / sems can shes rab 'chald par gyur pa blo chung ba dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su sbyind par byed de/ rkyen gang dang ma ldan pas khyed shes rab 'chald par 'gyur ba'i rkyend de dag
188b5('bum): ngas khyed la bshugs kyis zas dang skom dang / bzhon ba dang / mal cha dang / mye tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang
188b6('bum): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul dang / myi'i rkyend dang / yo byad kang mi yang rung ba rin po che sna bdud gi bar du long shig ces nas/ de shes rab kyi pha
188b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can de dag la phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas rmongs pa myed cing / shes rab dang ldan par gyurd pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi
188b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
189a1('bum): gnas// nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
189a2('bum): la gnasa'adus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong
189a3('bum): pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la
189a4('bum): gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po mye dzad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul
189a5('bum): byi rkang pa rnams la gnas dbang po rnams la gnas stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan laka rnams la gnas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i
189a6('bum): bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad myed pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la gnas/ mtha rad kyis
189a7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la
189a8('bum): gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs
189b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rjes su thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la kan
189b2('bum): shing / sems can rnams yongs su smind par byed de/ de ltar yongs su smind par byas pa'i rnams ngan song gsum las 'thar ba nas/ 'khor ba thams cad kyi bar las yongs su 'thar ro// 
189b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas tshe dang sdang pa rab 'byor
189b4('bum): 'di snyam du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ma pos de lta bu'i go bgo bar byan/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ji lta bu zhig yod snyam pa
189b5('bum): dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byod kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bka' sa yad to// 
189b6('bum): rab 'byor da sbyin pa'i pha rold du phyind pa ni/ byang chub se mas dpal sems dpa' chen po'i las so// rab 'byor nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189b7('bum): lam mo / rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol du phyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i las so// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sem par
189b8('bum): chen po'i lam mo / rab 'byor da thams gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam so// rab 'byor dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
190a1('bum): po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor
190a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de chen po stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems
190a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nga don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nga 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
190a4('bum): lam mo/ rab 'byor dade 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
190a5('bum): po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nga dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
190a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam
190a7('bum): mol / rab 'byor rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po'i lam so// rab 'byor kyi byig stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la las so// rab 'byor darung ba byed
190a8('bum): bathong pa nyid ni byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sem so// rab 'byor rag nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ban moms pa lo// rab khyod ma byas sa spong ba nyid de byang du
190b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
190b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor
190b3('bum): stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo/ rab 'byor da byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
190b4('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po la lam mo// rab 'byor de bsam gtan bzhi ni byang
190b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byo rang tshad myed pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i la ma mo// rab 'byor de gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
190b6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam so// rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor dmathar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni
190b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / spo dad pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i sem so// rab 'byor
190b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzind nams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam so// rab 'byor de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang
191a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da myi 'jigs pa bzhini byed/ 
191a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a3('bum): chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
191a4('bum): chen po'i lam mo// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par myi bya/ ba dang / gang sa ma bslabs kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
191a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos ka nga yang yod dam/ rab 'byor de gang la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i bslab par myi bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang
191a6('bum): myed de/ chos thams cad la ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi nus so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
191a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la ji ltar bslab par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed do zhes bgyi ba 'am/ 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba dang / 
191a8('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa myed pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// 'dus byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go// 'dus ma
191b1('bum): byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ so so'i spyi bo'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go// san cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos
191b2('bum): ni 'di dag go/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bgyi ba ni spros pa ma mchis pa/ 'phro bar bgyid pa'o// bcom
191b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad stong pa'o// rab 'bar da gal ta chas thams cad sad pa'o// rab 'byor da gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis
191b4('bum): stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po yang chos thams cad la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi skyes
191b5('bum): rab 'byor de chos thams cad stong pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la bslabs shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
191b6('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor da khyod kyis gzhan yang kang 'di skad du gal te chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyed de zhes bya ba 'am/ 'di dag go
191b7('bum): zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rtend pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ zag pa myed pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ 'dus byas kyi tshe
191b8('bum): ni 'di dag go/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ so so'i skye bo'i chos ni 'di dag go/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos ni 'di dag go/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
192a1('bum): chos ni 'di dag go/ dgra bcom pa'i chos ni 'di dag ko/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni 'di dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni 'di dag go zhes bya bar chos rna
192a2('bum): par dbye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rab 'byor da ci sems can 'di dag gis de ltar chos thams cad stong po zhes bya bar shes sam/ gal te shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la la
192a3('bum): bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi byed do// rab 'byor de sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya bar myi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192a4('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos rnam par dgod par byas shing / sems can rnams la chos stond to// rab 'byor da de
192a5('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub kyi lam la spyod pas thog ma nyid du 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya/ ste la/ mngon par 'du bya ba ma gtogs par 'di la chos pa
192a6('bum): yang ngo bo nyid kyis dmyigs su myed do zhes bya bar yongs su brtag par bya'o// de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la de ltar rtog pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
192a7('bum): pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam
192a8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las
192b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyig
192b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'am/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'am/ 
192b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'am/ dbang po lnga 'am/ stobs lnga 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi
192b4('bum): 'am/ tshad myed pa bzhi'am/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'am/ rnam par thard pa brgyad dam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'am/ rnam par thar
192b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sam/ gzu ngas kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
192b6('bum): 'am/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
192b7('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang la yang
192b8('bum): mngon par chags par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend par myi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
193a1('bum): su myed na gang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par 'gyur ba lta mi smos te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mngon par zhend pa myed par chos thams
193a2('bum): cad kyis rnam par spyod do// de bslab pa 'di la gnas shing / sems can 'di dag cis spyod ces sems kyi spyod pa la lta ste/ de 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzind pa la spyod
193a3('bum): de la/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzind pa las dkrol bar bya na/ dka' ba byed do zhes nas de'i tshe thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'di skad du ston to// 
193a4('bum): kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sbyin pa byin cig ces long pyod dang / ldan par 'gyur gi/ long spyod de dag kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims la
193a5('bum): 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tshul khrims srungs shig/ tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la ste/ nga po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du bzod pa 'dems te
193a6('bum): kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ bzod pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du brtson 'grus la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg
193a7('bum): brtson 'grus choms shig/ btson 'grus des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzind la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ting nge 'dzin la
193a8('bum): mnyam par zhog shig/ ting nge 'dzind des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du shes rab la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ shes rab sgoms shig/ shes rab
193b1('bum): des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ nang stong pa nyid de bya rlob sems su ma
193b2('bum): byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag chur sheg phyi song pa ldi rlo pa shig bye gro ba lji tu rlos su sde cig de la snying po kA yang byed do// de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'das
193b3('bum): tel/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de kyu rlom sems su ma khyed cig/ des snying po gang yang med do// de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong ba nyid la 'debs te/ kye sems
193b4('bum): can dag tshur sheg/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po la dang yang myed do// de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ 
193b5('bum): kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tha chen po stong pa nyid des kyang rlom se mas su ma byed cig/ de la snying po kang yang myed do// de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag
193b6('bum): tshur sheg/ don dam pa stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ don dam pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ des snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can
193b7('bum): ngag tshur sheg/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye mas
193b8('bum): can dag tshur sheg/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'das
194a1('bum): te la/ kye sems can dag chur sheg/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du
194a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
194a3('bum): snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
194a4('bum): snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dem sa te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid snyoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed
194a5('bum): cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du chos thams cad do// nga pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
194a6('bum): des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhi du rA gi mnA hI sngo pa kI la 'di ti kye sre tsA dag chu she ka rA gi yarba'i stso ba N+DI sgos kI gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
194a7('bum): myed do// de bzhin du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying
194a8('bum): po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig
194b1('bum): de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag chur sheg/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang
194b2('bum): myed do// de bzhin du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgoms shig/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed
194b3('bum): cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyis kyang rlom es
194b4('bum): su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du yang dag pa ra spong ba rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ yang da ga par spong ba rnams skoms shig/ yang dag par spong ba de dag
194b5('bum): gyis rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye semasan dag tshur sheg/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams skoms shig/ 
194b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du dbang po rnams la 'dems te/ kye sa mas can dag tshur sheg/ dbang po rnams sgoms shig/ dbang
194b7('bum): po de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du stobs rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ stobs rnams sgoms shig/ stobs de dag kyis kyang rlom
194b8('bum): sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams snyoms shig/ byang chub kyi yan lag
195a1('bum): rnams de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i// 
195a2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
195a3('bum): la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du
195a4('bum): bsam gtan rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bsam gtan rnams sgoms shig/ bsam gtan de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang
195a5('bum): yang myed do// de bzhin du tshad myed pa rnams la 'dems te kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ tshad myed pa rnams sgoms shig/ tshad myed pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
195a6('bum): snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgoms shig/ 
195a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du rnam par tha rad pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg
195a8('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams sgoms shig/ rnam par tha rad pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'debs
195b1('bum): tekye mas can dag chung sheg/ mthar kyis gnas mo yA 'jug pa rnaMs sgos shig mthar kyis gnas I ltos par 'jug pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po ka pa yang myed do// de bzhin du rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo
195b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgoms shig/ rnam
195b3('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnaMs la 'dems te/ kye
195b4('bum): sems can dag tshur sheg/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ngas shig/ mngon par shes pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin
195b5('bum): rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ ting nge 'dzind rnams sgoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyis kyang rno/ ma sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// del
195b6('bum): bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// 
195b7('bum): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgoms shika/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag kyis kyang rlom mes
195b8('bum): su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sgoms shig/ myi 'jigs pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems
196a1('bum): su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgoms shig/ so so
196a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ des snying po gang yang byed do// de bzhin du snying rje chen po la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ snying rje chen po sgoms shig/ snying rjen po
196a3('bum): rlom me su ma byed bko la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la 'debs te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgoms shig/ sangs
196a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du gyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus 'dams te/ kye sems can dag
196a5('bum): chur sheg/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du
196a6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ del
196a7('bum): la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu snyoms shig/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de dag kyis kyang rlom sem
196a8('bum): su ma byed cig de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems cadan dag tshur shes/ dgra bcom pa nyid sgoms shig/ dgra bcom pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ 
196b1('bum): de la snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du rang byang chub la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rang byang chub snyoms shig/ rang byang chub des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ des snying po gang lnga/ 
196b2('bum): myed do// de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la
196b3('bum): snying po gang yang myed do// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la 'dems te/ kye sems can dag tshur sheg/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid des kyang
196b4('bum): rlom sems su ma byed cig/ de la snying po gang yang myed do// de de ltar sems can rnams la 'debs pa dang / rjes su stonang pa bye da cing / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod kyang gang la yang
196b5('bum): mngon par zhend pa gang yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni mngon par zhend pa myed pa ste/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la s+ho// nga pa nyid kyi phyir gang gyis mngon par zhend par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid
196b6('bum): shes rab bam pa / rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam la spyod kyang gang la yang myi gnas ste
196b7('bum): de gnas pa myed pa'i tshul kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi gnas so// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myil
197a1('bum): gnas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi gnas so// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi gnas so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang
197a2('bum): de la myi gnas so// de bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po ni bsam gtan dang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par
197a3('bum): gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
197a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyi sa stong ngo / gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gis stong ngo'o/ rnam pa gang gyis mnyam kha gzhag pa'i rnam pa
197a5('bum): de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan gsum/ pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pa ni bsam gtan
197a6('bum): gsum pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par 'jog pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de bsam gtan bzhi pa la
197a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 
197a8('bum): rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de byams pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byams pa ni byams pa'i rang
197b1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de snying rje chen po la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la
197b2('bum): myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i nam
197b3('bum): pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// de dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dga' ba ni dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang
197b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa lernam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhes
197b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar btang snyoms ni btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang ba'i
197b6('bum): kyis hong ngo // de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ster nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni nem mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi ra
197b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyos
197b8('bum): par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po/ gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhi
198a1('bum): gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'dug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
198a2('bum): na de ni 'di ltar cung zad myed pa'i skye mched ni cung zad mye pa'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag
198a3('bum): kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de 'du shes myed 'du shes myed 'du zhes myed myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myi ni skye mched
198a4('bum): ni 'du she sde 'du she mye n+de skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin
198a5('bum): gyis stong ngo // de rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la snyoms par 'drug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa rnams ni rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
198a6('bum): kyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam pa gzhag bI na pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyos
198a7('bum): par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
198a8('bum): gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi
198b1('bum): gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gad kyis ma
198b2('bum): bar gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de yang dag par spong ba bzhi la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba
198b3('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la
198b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam sa kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de
198b5('bum): yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzha ga pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de dbang po lnga la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
198b6('bum): na de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa kar gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
198b7('bum): de stobs lnga la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam
198b8('bum): pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag
199a1('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de 'phags pa'i la
199a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam
199a3('bum): par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la snyoms par 'dug kyang de sa myi gnas te/ de ci'i
199a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo po/ gang mnyam bar gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gyis
199a5('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // de rnam par tha rad pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa mye/ da pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir
199a6('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ni/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rang bzhin gis stong ngo // gang mnyam par
199a7('bum): gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam pa gang kyis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // de mngon par shes pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug kyang de la myi gnas te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
199a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gang mnyam par gzhog pa de yang rang bzhin gis stong ngo // rnam pa gang gis mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang
199b1('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob kyang de la myi gnas so// de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob kyang de la myi gnas so// de phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob kyang de la myi gnas so// de dag
199b2('bum): bcom pa nyid thob kyang de la myi gnas so// de rang byang chub thob kyang de la myi gnas so// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du phyi gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsad dpa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir myi gnas te/ gnyis
199b3('bum): gang zhe na/ ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa ste/ de gnyis kyi phyir gang la yang gnas pa'am/ gang kyis gnas pa'am/ gang gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu de dag la myed do// de tsam gyis dga' bar yang myi
199b4('bum): myi 'dzind te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de 'di snyam du bdag kyis rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi bya ba yin te/ de la gnas par myi bya'o// bdag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
199b5('bum): 'bras bu 'thob par myi bya ba yin te/ de la gnas par myi bya'o// bdag gis phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi bya ba ma yin te/ la gnas par myi bya'o// bdag kyis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thod
199b6('bum): par myi bya ba ma yin te/ de la gnas par myi bya'o// bdag kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du 'thob pa myi bya ba ma yin te/ de la gnas par myi bya'o// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
199b7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gyis ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan
199b8('bum): gang yang ma bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis ni sa dang po nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do/ 
199b9('bum): de ci'i phyi der/ bdag kyis nis dang po nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dge par rdzogs so sam la su sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gzhan gsasapas bskyed do/ 
200a1('bum): bdag kyis ni sa gnyis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni
200a2('bum): sa gsum pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni sa bzhi pa nas nye bar bzu
200a3('bum): ste'/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma skyed do// bdag gis ni sa lnga pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
200a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni sa drug pa/ nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
200a5('bum): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems kanan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni sa bdun pa nas nyabar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
200a6('bum): chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni sa brgyad pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma
200a7('bum): gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do// bdag kyis ni sa dku pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan kang
200a8('bum): yang ma bskyed do// bdag gis ni sa bcu pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan kar yang ma bskyed do// byang chub mas
200b1('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par sems gzhan gang yang ma bskyed do snyam ste/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200b2('bum): chen po ni sems g.yeng ba myed par lus sam ngag gam/ yid kyis kang spyod kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyis myi spyod pa myed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas nas
200b3('bum): yid g.yeng ba myed par byang chub kyi lam la sgrub bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma skyes pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi lam ji ltar bsgrub
200b4('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ste/ de ji lta bu zhes byas na/ gang mngon par 'du myi byed pa
200b5('bum): de dag la ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de ba zhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos
200b6('bum): nyid de bzhin du gnas pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang
200b7('bum): rung ste/ chos rnams kyi gnas nyid ni de bzhin du gnas so// de la yang gang chos kyi gnas nyid de lta bu myi shes pa de dag gi dond tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam snyed de/ lam des
200b8('bum): sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su tha rad par byed do// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ skyes par gyur pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
201a1('bum): bkalasaHlad pa/ ma yin no// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ma skyes pa'i lam gis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ ma yin no// 
201a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na skyes kyang skyes la/ ma skyes kyang ma skyes pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' satsald pa/ ma yin no// gsold pa/ bcom
201a3('bum): ldan 'das 'o na skyes pa yang ma lags/ ma skyes pa yang ma lags pa'i lam gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ang
201a4('bum): 'o na byang chub ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub ni lam gyis ma thob pa yang ma yin/ lam ma yin pas 'thob pa yang ma yin te/ byang
201a5('bum): chub nyid kyang lam mo/ lam nyid kyang byang chub bo// gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub nyid kyang lam la/ lam nyi da kyang byang chub lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
201a6('bum): dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas/ thob par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / de bzhin
201a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis brjod do zhes kyang ci'i slad du bstand/ bcom ldan
201a8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas shig byang chub thob par byed pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
201b1('bum): sangs rgyas ni byang chub thob par myi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang byang chub bo// byang chub nyid kyang sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas sad pa/ rab 'byor da gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
201b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos byang chub snga nas thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ tshul khrims kyi pha
201b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
201b4('bum): su rdzogs par byas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su jo gas par byas// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
201b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzog sa par byas/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ don da ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ 'dus pa byas
201b6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas
201b7('bum): dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid yongs su thogs par byas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ 
201b8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya
202a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs
202a2('bum): par byas/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yong/ 
202a3('bum): su rdzogs par byas/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
202a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byas/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byas/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo ste/ nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs
202a5('bum): su rdzogs par byas/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/ gzu gas kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
202a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byas/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas/ snying rje chen
202a7('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas phyi nad chad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa chos thams cad dbang sgyur
202b1('bum): ba zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kal te chos thams cad rang bzhin kyis dben pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
202b2('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' satsa la pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dang gzhan gi lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag
202b3('bum): ki gnas ngan lend dang / yid kyi gnas ngan lend yongs su sbyong ste/ de yongs su dag par bya bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus kyi gnas ngan len ni gang
202b4('bum): lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len ni gang lags/ yid kyi gan sa ngan lend ni gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsaladapa/ lus kyi las myi dge ba dang / srog gcod pa dang
202b5('bum): ma byind par lend pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa pyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnas ngan len de to// ngag kyi las myi dge ba rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa'i
