228b4('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de
228b5('bum): dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang
228b6('bum): bya bar myi nus na gzhan ka don lta ci smos te/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shika/ phongs pas zild kyis non cing nyings
228b7('bum): nyid kyis zos te/ ngan song gsum las myi tha rad par gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni stug
228b8('bum): bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi dond kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song ki skye gnas sam/ gshis
229a1('bum): rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par myi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci spos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam ni
229a2('bum): go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems
229a3('bum): su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
229a4('bum): 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa 'i sems 'ga' tsam ki ko skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'byod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes stond to// sems can se lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la
229a5('bum): 'di skad du chos stond te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal bste la/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan ga don sta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smind pa ni sems can dmyal ba
229a6('bum): 'am/ byol song ko skye gnas sam/ gshim je'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par gyi rus na gzhan gdon pa sa ci spos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo ma
229a7('bum): sems 'ga' tsam ki go skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur da ta re zhes chos stond to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba
229a8('bum): ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par sbyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje 'i 'jig rten yin te/ de skar khyed ngan song gsum du srung na/ bdag cas
229b1('bum): byan dod par myi nus sa/ gzhan gdod pa smra ma spos kyis/ de'i phyir byed kyis g.yeng ba mams 'ga' bas kyi go skabs kyang phyi rgyam phyis 'byor pa can du gyurang ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can zhes
229b2('bum): rab 'chas pa can gang ci snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi dond kyang bya bar myi nus na/ gzhan gi don da la
229b3('bum): ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chald pa'i rnam par sbyind pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gi go
229b4('bum): skabs kyang myi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can tu gyur da ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi 'amyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag kyi sdug ba la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byas
229b5('bum): pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi gyod pa can ka pa ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi
229b6('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos stond te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhe nad par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis
229b7('bum): stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhend par myi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhend pa myed do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
229b8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma
230a1('bum): gnas pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstand par myi nus te/ lam log par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par myi nus so// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na
230a2('bum): bya 'dab ma myed pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar myi nus so// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brtend par sems can rnams la chos stond par
230a3('bum): myi nus so// rab 'byor de de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes
230a4('bum): pa mngon pam bsgrubs pas de dag gis sems kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// des lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag
230a5('bum): tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul zhis de dag tu song zhing / sems so mas kyis khongs su chud par byas shing / de dang mthun par sbyin
230a6('bum): ba'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bzod 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtam gi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du 'o
230a7('bum): stond to// des lha'i myig gis so phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang 'i snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang thu 'phrul
230a8('bum): gyis de dag tu song zhing ga sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dag mthun par smid pa'i gtam 'am/ rdul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bcor 'grus kyi gtam
230b1('bum): bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// des lha'i myig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
230b2('bum): klung ki bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas
230b3('bum): shing / de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan ki gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bde
230b4('bum): ba'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// des lha'i myig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag
230b5('bum): kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gis de dag / tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud bar byas nas de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrim
230b6('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtas 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'pha' sa pa'i bdes pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtas kyi bar du chos
230b7('bum): stond to// des lnga'i myig gis bya ba shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ci snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang
230b8('bum): rdzu 'phrul kis de dag tu song zhing sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyid pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtas 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'gru/ 
232a1('bum): myong/ sa ma na sa / na mtshal pan#thos nas kyang mnan byed du bzu
232a2('bum): bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan ki katam 'am/ shes rab
232a3('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
232a4('bum): 'das ka pa'i snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga'i na pas nyan da to// thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos
232a5('bum): ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bcos 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan ki kata ma 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 
232a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten ki khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ka ji snyed cig
232a7('bum): chos stond pa de dag gi chos su'i rna bas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems cad rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am// tshul khris
232a8('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan ki gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos
232b1('bum): stond to// de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten ki khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga'i rna pas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin
232b2('bum): nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi
232b3('bum): gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos stond to// de byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
232b4('bum): ki khams kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i na bas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid
232b5('bum): du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
232b6('bum): ki gtam 'tha shes rab kyi gtam 'am 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtas gi bar du chos stonang to// de'ang wAl phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig nyen gi khams gang ka'i klung gi byes
232b7('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna pas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems
232b8('bum): can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 
233a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgya
233a2('bum): phyi nang/ bcom ldan 'das ka ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin
233a3('bum): ba'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bcon 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am 'bru
233a4('bum): ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de nub byang ki phyo kas mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed dag nal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig chos ston
233a5('bum): pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhi na nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am
233a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam
233a7('bum): ki bar du chos stond to// de 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de dag gi chos lnga yin pas nyand te/ thos
233a8('bum): nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems cas rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bcon 'gru
233b1('bum): kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan ki gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtas kyi bar du chos ston to// de steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams
233b2('bum): gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed cig chos stond pa de lha'i rna bas nyand te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzind to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can
233b3('bum): rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ bcon 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i
233b4('bum): bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos ston tol// de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas shi nad tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems
233b5('bum): can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhin du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam
233b6('bum): gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar du chos stond to// de bdag dang gzhan gi sngon gi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su tran te/ sngon gi
233b7('bum): gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de sems can sngon
233b8('bum): gi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ci snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan
234a1('bum): gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam kyi bar du chos ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ki khams gang ka'i
234a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos stond te/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'a
234a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam gtan gi gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam gi bar
234a4('bum): du chos stond to// de zag pa myed pa'i mngon tu bya ba'i shes pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa myed pa mngon tu bya ba'i zhes pa shind tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston
234a5('bum): tel/ sbyin pa'i gtam 'am/ tshul khrims kyi gtam 'am/ bzod pa'i gtam 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam 'am/ bsam ka ta na ki gtam 'am/ shes rab kyi gtam 'am/ 'phags pa'i
234a6('bum): bden pa'i gtam 'am/ 'byung ba'i gtam kyi bar du chos stod to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myod pa'im/ mngon par shes pa
234a7('bum): nams mngon par sgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dres pa de dag gis lus mi dang ci lta bu yongs su bzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su bzung zhing de/ mos pa mi lta ba bzhin du sems
234a8('bum): can rnams kyi don byed de/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal de dag gis glo bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas yul pa'i skyes bu ni dgongs pa thams cad byed kyang / bde
234b1('bum): pa'am sdug bsngal des gos par 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas rnam par che zhing
234b2('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang / bde ba 'am sdug bsngal des 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
234b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnam par che bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongasasu smyind par 'gyur ba de
234b4('bum): ltar che bar bya ste/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par ma byas par/ bla na myed pa yang
234b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gi yan lag/ dang myi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
234b6('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na
234b7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dge ba'i chos thams cad ni/ byang chub ses
234b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ka yan lag go// gsol dbang / bcom ldan 'das lam gi yan laka gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i
235a1('bum): lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag kang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas la pa/ sems dang po bskyed po nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod
235a2('bum): kyang de la myi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la ni yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ sbyin
235a3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi
235a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni tshul khrims so/ bdag gis tshul khrims srung ngo // 'di'i don tu tshul khrims srung po 'i
235a5('bum): gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgo la ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
235a6('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa sgo
235a7('bum): pa'o// 'di'i don tu sgom par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ 
235a8('bum): sems dpa po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'thung se dge mchos brtson 'bras kyi sa ro ga tu phyin pas grod kyang / des myi rtog ci de 'thor 'bram com pas tshab nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod 'acor 'gru / 
235b1('bum): bdag gis 'artson 'grus com mo/ 'di'i don tu brtson 'grus partsam mo zhes gsum po de dag la mye rtog pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
235b2('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing de bsam gtan la mnyam par
235b3('bum): gzhog pa'i che/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag ko/ 'di'i don tu bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go zhes gsum po de dag ya myi
235b4('bum): rtog pa ste bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa gang gis pa dag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye ba
235b5('bum): bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis shes rab
235b6('bum): sgom mo/ 'di'i dond tu shes rab sgom mo/ zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kad kyis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan las
235b7('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyi kyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni nang stong pa
235b8('bum): nyid do// bdag kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
236a1('bum): smos pa 'di ni lam g.yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos kyi stong pa nyid la gyod kyang des myi rtog cing phyi stong pa nyid sprol ba'i cha
236a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdag
236a3('bum): kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing / 
236a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyin pa stong pa nyid sgom bar bya'o// 'di'i don tu phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// zhes
236a5('bum): gsum po de dag la myi tog pa ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kar kyis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'a di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ sems dngapa po
236a6('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la khyod kyang de la myi rtog cing stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshi thobo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// 
236a7('bum): bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor la las sgrol zhing
236a8('bum): gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam kyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la gyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing chen po stong pa nyid
236b1('bum): sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ chen po
236b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan la ka dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid
236b3('bum): la spyod kyang de dag la myi rtog cing don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dam pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis don dam pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu don dam pa stong pa
236b4('bum): nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
236b5('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la khyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'du
236b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'dus byas stong pa nyid sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang
236b7('bum): 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de dag
236b8('bum): la myi rtog cing 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu 'dus
237a1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge
237a2('bum): ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
237a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mthal las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi nyon
237a4('bum): pa ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang ki sA 'khor ba la sa sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste
237a5('bum): dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mye tog cing / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
237a6('bum): stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog ma dang 'a ma byed pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu thogs dpa' ma myed pa stong ba nyid rlom mo zhes gsum po de dag la gyi rtog pa me/ thog la rang ba ma myed pa song
237a7('bum): pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang spros pa 'di na las gi yan lag dge ba mtshas so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba mcha ma dor ba byed pa spong pa
237a8('bum): nyid la khyod kyang des gyi tog cing dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dim dor ba myed pa spong ba nyid do// bdag gis dor ba byed pa spong ba nyid rlom par bya'o// 'dzi'i
237b1('bum): don tu dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi tog pa ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos
237b2('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
237b3('bum): do'o// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing
237b4('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / chos thams
237b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad s+ho/ ngapa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu chos thams cad stong
237b6('bum): pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po
237b7('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi tog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid po
237b8('bum): pa nyid do// bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang
238a1('bum): 'khor ba las rlom zhing / gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba chom so/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos kyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la khyod
238a2('bum): kyang de la myi rtog cing / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid smom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyim 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu kyi
238a3('bum): dbyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las stsol zhing gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam ni yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ 
238a4('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i tshe sa dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la khyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
238a5('bum): kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 
238a6('bum): dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las spol zhing / gzhan yang skol pa 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo
238a7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i
238a8('bum): don tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos
238b1('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'azung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la khyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe// ngo bo nyid kyis
238b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po
238b3('bum): de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol pa 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed
238b4('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la khyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skom pa'i tshe/ rdo
238b5('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom mo zhes
238b6('bum): gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan sang sgos pa 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed
238b7('bum): pa nas nye bam bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gyod kyang / des myi rtog cing yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis spong ba
238b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams skom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la phyi rtog pa ste/ 
239a1('bum): dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sem
239a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bdag
239a3('bum): gis rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams skom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan
239a4('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sem sa dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rton
239a5('bum): cing dbang po lnga sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dbang po rnams so// bdag gis dbang po rnams / ma par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes gsuM
239a6('bum): po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
239a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni stobs rnams so// bdag gis stong
239a8('bum): rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu stobs rnams sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ stobs kang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan laka
239b1('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la dpyod kyang de la gyi rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan las
239b2('bum): rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sbom mo
239b3('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mya rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba lus sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
239b4('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i
239b5('bum): tshelango bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i wam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa
239b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag
239b7('bum): dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing 'phags pa'i bden
239b8('bum): ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa
240a1('bum): rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mye rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan ya
240a2('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la myi rtog
240a3('bum): cing / bsam gtan rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu bsam gtan rnams skom mo zhes gsuM
240a4('bum): po de dag la mye tog pa ste/ bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ka yan la ka dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzu
240a5('bum): stel/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yidage ba'i chos tshad myed pa bzhi la khyod kyang de la myi tog cing / chad myed rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni
240a6('bum): tshad myed pa rnams so// bdag gis chad myed pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu chad byed pa rnams sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ tshad byed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan
240a7('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis
240a8('bum): khyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis gzugs skye
240b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'dral dang tu gzags med pa' snyoms par 'dag pa rnams skam par ba'/ 'di'i don tu gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la
240b2('bum): myi tog cing / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
240b3('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par tha da pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / rnam par tha rad pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa
240b4('bum): brgyad do// bdag gis rnas par tha dad pa brgyad sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par ba ra pa sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mye tog/ pa ste/ rnam par thard pa brgyad gang zhis bdag kyang 'khor bas pa
240b5('bum): stsol zhing gzhan yang skol ba 'di ni lam gi yas lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar
240b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa dku la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas
240b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams so// bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i dond tu ma ba rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams slom mo zhes gsu
240b8('bum): po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ga yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed
241a1('bum): pa nas nye bar 'thung ste/ byang chub sems dpan sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos nas par bdad pa ma stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa pa skyed pa la khyod kyang des kyi rtog cing / nam
241a2('bum): par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom pa'i che/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa rnams so// 
241a3('bum): bdag gis rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sbom mo zhes gsum po de dang / 
241a4('bum): la myi rtog pas ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las la zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ga yan lag dge ba'i chos
241a5('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa
241a6('bum): 'che/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu mngon par shes pa rnams sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag
241a7('bum): myi tog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzham sa sgrol pa 'di ni lam gyi yan laka dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
241a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams so// 
241b1('bum): bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams skom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzind gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
241b2('bum): 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang / de la myi rtog cing
241b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu gzungs kyi sgo rnams sbom mo zhes gsu
241b4('bum): po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ gzungs kyi sgo kang kis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gis na sa ka dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
241b5('bum): bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gyod kyang de sa rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i cha
241b6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo
241b7('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la myi tog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dpapo
241b8('bum): bskyed pa nas nyi zla ma mthu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / phyi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis song / 
242a1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// bdag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di la dan tu mya 'jigs pa rnams skam pa zhes gsum pa de dag la mya rtag pa ste
242a2('bum): mya 'jigs pa rnams rnam bur byal/ 'di'i don tu myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ myi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
242a3('bum): 'di ni lam ga yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang de la myi
242a4('bum): rtog cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par ga pa rnams so// bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
242a5('bum): sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu so so ya bdag par rig pa rnams sbom mo zhes gsum po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ ma la yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
242a6('bum): 'ang gzhan yang stsol pa 'di ni las gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'azung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba chos snyid rje chen po ma myod
242a7('bum): kyang de la kyi rtog cing / snying rje chen po sprom pa'i ma ngom nyid kyis spong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni snying je chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu snying khyen pa rlom yum
242a8('bum): de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam ki yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
242b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bamo brgyad la spyod kyang de la myi rtog cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong
242b2('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par bya'o// 'di'i don tu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sbom mo zhes gsum
242b3('bum): po de dag la myi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor nga dge ba'i tshe
242b4('bum): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dbang lta kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
242b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams sems can chad myed pa des de 'khor ba'i rgyam tsho las rgal bar/ gyu rang pa dang / rgal ba dang rgal bar 'gyur ba so/ lam res yongs su rdzogs par byas shing
242b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid thob par byed do// / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor mo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor
242b7('bum): lo la skor te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// ljid/ shes rab kyi pha rolas tu phyind pa stong phrag bcub las se'u drug bcu ya dasu pa'o// 
242b8('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ 
243a1('bum): tugs nyams de dag byang chub sem sa dpa' chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ga yin zhem zer ba ni / rab 'byor da sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'a
243a2('bum): rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par
243a3('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gci ka dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
243a4('bum): pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin ga / gam pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
243a5('bum): byung bas de yod do// rab 'byor 'dis sa dper na/ zhugs pa yang gzhan sa 'bras bus gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang bag ma yin zhes kyi bya'o// rab 'byong
243a6('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad myed pa'i bar du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa
243a7('bum): myed pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor da de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// rab 'byord
243b1('bum): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di ni byol song
243b2('bum): gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di'i myi'i/ 'di'i na rigs kyi sa'o// 'di'i ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni
243b3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar khyad par
243b4('bum): dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmyigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmyigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du la
243b5('bum): kyi rnam par smind pa la yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin nol/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams
243b6('bum): cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la las dang / las kyi rnam par sbyind pa myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor dkang kang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis spong ba'i chos thams cad de ltar ma zhes pa de dag ni ngan par
243b7('bum): byang pa 'am/ legs par myang ba'am/ phyi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par myang ba'i las kyis ngan song gsum du lhung ngo // legs par gyung pa'i las kyis su dang phyir skye'o/ 
243b8('bum): nyams pa myed pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la s+yang/ tshul khris
244a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myang / bzod pa la pha rol tu phand pa la 5/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la kyang / bsam gtan gi pha rol
244a2('bum): tu phyind pa la s+yad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myang // nang stong pa nyid la s+yad/ phyi stong pa nyid la s+yang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la s+yad/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myang/ chen po stong pa nyid la
244a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la lnga 'dus byas stong pa nyid la s+yad/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la s+yad/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myad/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la s+yad/ dor ba myed pa stong pa
244a4('bum): nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la s+yad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la s+yad/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la kyang/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la byad/ ngobo
244a5('bum): nyid stong ba nyid la kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gyur// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la s+ya / ya dag par spong ba rnams la s+yad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
244a6('bum): kyang / dbang po rnamasas kyang / stobs rnamams kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la kyang / 'phags pachi lam sanas ga brgyad pas kyang // 'phags pa'i 'ded pa rnamasas kyang
244a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams la s+yad/ tshad myed pa rnams la s+ya da/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la s+yad/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'
244a8('bum): rnams la s+yad/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la s+yad/ mngon par shes pa rnams la s+yad/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la s+yad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la s+yad
244b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la s+yad/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la s+yang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la s+yang/ snying rje chen po la s+yad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la s+yad de
244b2('bum): nyams myed pa'i pyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam bzhag cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
244b3('bum): 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud zos shing rgyud lnga 'khor bar myi ltung bar de ltar don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom
244b4('bum): ldan 'das kyi lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas na sa chud sA'i 'khor ba g.yogs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 
244b5('bum): su la pa/ rab 'byor da ma yin no// gsol dpa brtsam ldan 'das ji la kas/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am dkar po 'am/ gnag pa'am/ dkar ba 'am/ myi kanas kyi
244b6('bum): dkar ba lcags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmyigs na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
244b7('bum): 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdang / lha dang phyir pa ltar gdags pa ma'ang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'i ltar gdags pa sa'ang / byir gyi 'ong bar 'i ltar gdags pa ma'ang / dgra bcom par ji ltar gdags pa
244b8('bum): mdzad rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpam ji ltar gdags pa ma'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par thogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji snyam ka dgas pa mdzad/ 
245a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da'i sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol dang/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
245a2('bum): bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
245a3('bum): ba'i byang chub tu kyi 'jug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dpa 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams kyi 'grol te/ rab 'byor de sems can de dag ros
245a4('bum): nams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis spong par gyi shes la/ kyi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su gyi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom
245a5('bum): ldan 'das de dag las/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang da/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ma
245a6('bum): sbyar bri ma ma ma'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni myed cingasang dag pa ma yin par chos rnams la yod par btags zhing / sems can byed pa sa sems can du 'du
245a7('bum): sa/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor pa skyed pa la son par 'du shes/ 'du shes byed pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du byed byed ba la 'du byed bu 'du shes/ rnam pa shes pa byed pas na
245a8('bum): par shes par 'du shes/ myig myed pa la myig tu 'du shes/ rna ba byed pa sa na bar 'du shes/ sA myed pa la sngar 'du shes/ lce myed pa la khyer 'du shes/ lus myed pa la lus su 'du zhes/ yod byed/ 
245b1('bum): pa la yid du 'du shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra myed pa la sgrar 'du shes/ dri myed pa la drir 'du shes/ ro myed pa la ror 'du shes/ reg myed pa la reg tu 'du shes/ chos myed pa la chos
245b2('bum): su 'du shes/ myig ki rnam par she la byed pa la myig gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la na ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ snga'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la sna'i rnam par shes par
245b3('bum): 'du shes/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa la lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa la yid kyi rnam par shes
245b4('bum): par 'du shes/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la na ba'i' dus te reg par 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la
245b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa la/ lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa/ la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te
245b6('bum): reg pa myed pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor bar 'du shes na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dkyis tshor
245b7('bum): ba myed pa la na pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa la snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sre'i 'dus te reg pa'i skyes
245b8('bum): kyis tshor ba myed pa la/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myed pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus
246a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sa'i khams myed pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams myed pa la chu'i khams su 'dun
246a2('bum): mye'i khams myed pa la kye'i khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams myed pa la chung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams byed pa sa rnam ma'a'i khams su 'dugs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams byed pa la rnam
246a3('bum): shes pa'i mas sa 'dushes// ma rin pa byed pa la ma rig par 'du gas/ 'du byed byed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam pa shes pa byed pa sa po shes 'an/ da zugs byed pas
246a4('bum): dang gzugs su 'du shes/ skye mched drug skyed pa la skye mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa byed pa la reg par 'du shes/ tshor ba byed pas tshor bar 'du shes/ med pa myed pa sa med par 'du shes
246a5('bum): len pa byed pa la len par 'dushes/ sred pa myed pa dpar 'dushes/ snre ba byed pa sa lci bar 'dugs/ kyi gzha 'dun pa/ 'jig cad pa'i sos byed
246a6('bum): sa bya pa bye nga lu 'i mas po kyin po
246b1('bum): rnamapas dpal sems nga can pazhes rab kyi pa nas phyidad par dag pa matsas thams par 'dus byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i byang sa myor cing/ blan myed pa yang dag par mazhus pa'i byang chus
246b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to// 
246b3('bum): thams cad rang kyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems
246b4('bum): can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' sa la pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems da pal sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
246b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la chos ston to// 
246b6('bum): 'chad do// 'jog go/ 'god do// 'grel to// rnam par 'grel to// gsal bar byed do// yang dag par brjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs ka pa ji snyed
246b7('bum): pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnam par dgod pa de thams cad yongs su bzung ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bas sems
247a1('bum): can rnams las chung lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol lo// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'chal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
247a2('bum): ram/ 'ond te sdug bsngal gis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'o nad te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ snus
247a3('bum): bsngal 'gog pa 'chal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'ond te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan lus 'da' bar 'gyur ro
247a4('bum): 'ond te lam gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yaHsa dpa/ rab 'byor da sug/ sA la zhes pas yongs su mya ngan las kyi 'dal ste/ snun
247a5('bum): bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pa sa yongs su mya ngan las myi 'dal ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa zhes pas yongs su mya
247a6('bum): ngan las myi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su gyi 'dal ste/ lam gas kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam
247a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las myi 'dal ba ma yin no// sdug bsngal gis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su
247a8('bum): mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yod/ 
247b1('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das kang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshayad pa yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchi/ 
247b2('bum): kun 'byung ba 'tshal pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal pa yang ma mchis lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal pa yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid
247b3('bum): ces bgyi ba de gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'as lad pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
247b4('bum): dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon mye da pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ 
247b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i na tes chos kyi dbyings myi nyam myi 'gri ba par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bde
247b6('bum): 'khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don tu spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
247b7('bum): phyind pa la ji ltar myang na/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don tu spyod pa lags/ mi ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/ khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung zhing / byang chub
247b8('bum): sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
248a1('bum): chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmyigs su myed pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmyigs pas/ bden par rtogs pa 'am/ bden par ma rtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong
248a2('bum): ste/ des de ltar mthong nas skyon myed par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas spyi bor ltung bar myi
248a3('bum): 'gyur te/ de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor snang ba myed do// de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis de la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi sgrub kho// tshad myed pa bzhi sgrub po
248a4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo// de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes parabyed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do// 
248a5('bum): de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmyigs pa'i sems kyi skyed do// kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung pas dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed
248a6('bum): kyang 'gog pa la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// lam sgom yang lam la dmyigs pa'i sems myi skyed do// gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol pa'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa 'i lta ba bzhin du
248a7('bum): byed pa mthong ba byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bgyi ba de ka pasags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do// 
248a8('bum): gsol pa/ stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las lang pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar swA ste/ zam
248b1('bum): nyid gang la gnas shing / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba de lta bumang pa nyid chos gang sa yang song ba khyi mthong ngo // dngam pa byed pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis la sa'ang / rang ba
248b2('bum): rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pas ma byas/ phyir myi 'ong bas ma byas/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ rgyund tu zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ kang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub
248b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis myi shes myi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pa sa sems can rnams la chos ston/ da to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgyal
248b5('bum): pa las le'u bdun bcu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
248b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal techos thams cad dngas lam mchis te/ dedag sangs rgyas kyis ma ma'ang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang sa bgyis/ rag bcos pas kyangs bgyis phyir gyi 'odabs pa bgyis/ yan cig
248b7('bum): phyir myi 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la dpyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na
248b8('bum): chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o// 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di dag ni lha'o// 'di dag ni myi'o// las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
249a1('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni phyim 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi skam 'gyur ro// las 'odas ni sum ma rgya man sum ki slar 'gyu ro// 
249a2('bum): 'dis ni mtshe ma'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dga' ldan gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'phrul dka'i lhar 'gyur ro// sas 'dis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs ris kyi lhar
249a3('bum): 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs lha nye phan ki lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor ki lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs chen gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni snang ba'i skar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni
249a4('bum): chung snang gi slar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshad myed snang ba'i slar 'gyurarol/ las 'dis ni kun sdang dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni chung dge 'i skar 'gyu
249a5('bum): las 'dis ni tshad myed dge ba'i yum 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dge rgya sa kyi snyam 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni che ba'i slar 'gyur ro// lam 'das na mtha' skar 'gyur ra/ las 'dis ni chung che'i sar
249a6('bum): 'gyur ro// las 'dis na ched byed che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'bras bu che ba'i ltar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni myi che ba'i lar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni myi gdung ba'i la 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gnad tu ma
249a7('bum): ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni kye nom snang ba'i slar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'og phyir gi ltar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni nam mkha' mthal yas skye mched kyi skam 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha' yas
249a8('bum): skye mched gi lha ma 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni cung zad myed pa'i skye mched gi skar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'du shes khyed 'du shes byed byin skye mched kyi sum 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur
249b1('bum): 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyuraro// 
249b2('bum): las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba tha dad du dpe ba 'am/ nam
249b3('bum): par dkod pa yang ci ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba kang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang kyis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song kyi skye gnas su mchi ba'am
249b4('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ lhar skye da ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am
249b5('bum): dga' ldan gi lbar skye ba 'am 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa
249b6('bum): kur 'khor gyi lham skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen ki ser skye ba 'am/ sdang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung sdang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ chad myed sdang ba'i spar skye ba 'am/ kun snga bcu'i lha skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lam skye ba'am/ 
249b7('bum): chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chang dka' lhar skya ba 'am/ chad myang dag pa'i lhar smra ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am
249b8('bum): tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ shi nad tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ bya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ 'og myin
250a1('bum): ki slar skye ba 'an pa' mngams skye ma ched kyi lhar skye ba ni gis marnams skye mched kyi ltar skye ba'i/ nung zad myed pa'i skye mched gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi skam skye ba 'am/ 
250a2('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am
250a3('bum): rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thob par gyur pa nas sems can rnaMs
250a4('bum): la 'khor ba nas yongs su dkrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka'
250a5('bum): stsal to// rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor de dngos po myed pa la ni sa kyang myed/ bya ba yang myed 'bras bu yang myed na/ 'on
250a6('bum): kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i chos la myi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tu myi shes te/ phyi nad ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag
250a7('bum): yul rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song ki skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ myi 'am rgyas chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi
250a8('bum): 'am mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan ka lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lha'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lha 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'azhor gi lha'am
250b1('bum): tshangs chen gi lhar 'am/ snang ba'i lha 'am/ chung snang gi lha'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lga 'am/ dge ba'i lha 'am/ chung dge'i lha 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha'am/ dge
250b2('bum): rgyas kyi lha 'am/ che ba'i lha 'am/ chung che'i lha 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lha 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/ myi che ba'i lha 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lha 'am/ shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lha 'aM
250b3('bum): 'og myin gi lha 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha'i nang
250b4('bum): du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po myed pa la ni las sa ma bya ba 'am 'bras bu myed de/ dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni ngos po myed pa nyid do// rab 'byor de de la 'di skad du dngos
250b5('bum): po myed pa la ni bya ba gang yang myed de/ bya ba gang gis sem sa can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba
250b6('bum): 'am/ lgar skye ba'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris su skye ba'am/ sum bcu \u0f7fgsum ki lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/ gzhan
250b7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am
250b8('bum): chung snang gi skar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun spang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i skar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i wAr skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar
251a1('bum): skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ myi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba
251a2('bum): 'am/ shi nad tu mthong ba'i spar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og myin gi spar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched gi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na
251a3('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched gi lhar skye ba 'am// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir
251a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gru mapa 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub
251a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la myod pa'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/ de no/ bapas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol
251a6('bum): 'gyur ba de sa bu'i bya ba gang yang myed do zhes zer 'di/ rab 'byor pa de'i sum du lems/ sam dngas po byed pa sa yin nam/ rgyun da du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po byed pa la yin nam/ lan cis
251a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po myed pa ma yin nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rang byang chub dngos po myed pa ma yin nas
251a8('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dngos po myed pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// 
251b1('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma
251b2('bum): mchis pa'o// rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
251b3('bum): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po myed pa'i chos shig dngos po myed pa'i chos thob par byed snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi
251b4('bum): bka' stsal dparab 'byor de de ltar na dngos po myed pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu
251b5('bum): myed pa thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ 'di lta ra mtshan nyid myed pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
251b6('bum): myong ba'i tshe thabs kyi mkhas pas sems can phyind ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhend pa/ myi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyurd pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa
251b7('bum): bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gyur pa myi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ dngos po la mngon par zhend pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa
251b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la dngos po'o zhes nas mngon par zhe nad par gyurd pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma no da pa de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis
252a1('bum): na ni mngon par 'du bgyid par ya pa'i sar 'gyur/ sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas jiste myi 'gros bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la sa / rab 'byor dpyi ci log ma btom
252a2('bum): bar ga pas gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngun skra'i rtse mo'i mags gzhag pa tsam yang byed do// rab 'byor dade lta bas na ci nas kyang dod 'digs la zhing
252a3('bum): rdzogs pa dang / thabs mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do// rab 'byor pa de ji snyam du sems/ myi lam du mthong ba la skyil ma de gang la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan sngam yongs su myong
252a4('bum): pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rmyilam nyid kyang ma mchis na/ rmyi lam mthong ba de la gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta
252a5('bum): smos kyang mi 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ 'jigarten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas
252a6('bum): pa'am/ zag pa myed pa 'am 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang rmyi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten
252a7('bum): las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa ma mchis pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmyil ma lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
252a8('bum): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ ci rmyi lam rgyud lngar 'khor ba yod dam/ gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ rmyi lam
252b1('bum): la lam snyoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang ba ra yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de
252b2('bum): ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ brjod pa dang tshig dang sgra dang yi ge thams cad kyis kadags su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ mye long la gzugs brnyan
252b3('bum): snang ba de gang las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'dus byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
252b4('bum): dngos po sod dmagasol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma la gas so// bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du byis pa rnams la sru ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma mchis te/ gzugs brnyan gis kyang
252b5('bum): ma mchis na/ gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du ba kyi sa pas/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am
252b6('bum): myi dang lham 'gyur ba'i suka las lta smos kyang ci 'tshalang te/ ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gang de la lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs
252b7('bum): par yang myi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/ lam bsgoms pas// kun
252b8('bum): nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam sgom pa lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalas lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du
253a1('bum): sems/ nags stug po dang / ra dang / gcong rong dang lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na/ sgra brnyan de las mngon 'du rje Ti mardon 'du ThAH sems can dmyal khar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas u
253a2('bum): 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ lha dang myir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma
253a3('bum): mchis na/ de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyid cing / mngon par 'du bgyis na/ sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ kashin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ 
253a4('bum): dang myir skye ba 'am sum ban+yA Na gsum gi ltar skye ba'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba'am/ dga' ldan ki lhar skye ba 'am 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'i
253a5('bum): tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ste nye phan gi lhan skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen ki lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba

253a8('bum): nom spang ba'i lham skye ba 'am/ 'og sbyin ki lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sar skye ba 'am/ nas shes mthal yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/ cung zad byed pa'i lce mched kyi sar / 
253b1('bum): pa 'am/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan ki lam gang la

253b5('bum): dang / grong khyer myed par grong khyer gi 'du shes su gyur / pa dang / bskyed mos tshal myed par skyed mos tshal gi 'du shes su/ gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'dus byas pas
253b6('bum): sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin je'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi
253b7('bum): skye 'am/ mche ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dka'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi skar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lhar

254a1('bum): dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i skar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che li skar skye ba 'am/ tshad myed che ba'i skar skye

254a4('bum): la 'du shes phyind ci log tu gyur pa de dang / myig gis log pa dar mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang / grong khyer dang / skyed mos tshal shi nad tu ma mchis na/ sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/
