263a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' sam med pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsolang
263a7('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems snying rje chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
263a8('bum): par 'tshang rgya 'am/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las lang pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
263b1('bum): brgyad bAn skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pam 'chang rgya'am/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba sa pa/ rab
263b2('bum): der bzhin no// de de bzhin te// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed
263b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pam 'chang kyi rgya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pAn+ta myi rgya'o/ brtsod 'grus kyi
263b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// bsam gtan ki pha rol da tu phyidad pa bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
263b5('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon parardzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// nang stong pa nyid bla na myed pa
263b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching myi rgya'o// phyi stong pa nyid bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma don par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na myed pa
263b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// chen po stong pa nyid tha
263b8('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'dus byas
264a1('bum): stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
264a2('bum): par 'tshang myi rgya'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
264a3('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
264a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdo na par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// rang kyi mtshan nyid stong
264a5('bum): pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang myi rgya'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
264a6('bum): bar 'tshang kyi rgya'o// dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
264a7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tha
264a8('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// / yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o/ 
264b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// dbang po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang gyi
264b2('bum): rgya'o// stobs rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mya rgya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
264b3('bum): par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par
264b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par myi rgya'o// bsam gtan rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// chad myed pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
264b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// gzugs / myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ bla na myed pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par thogs par 'chang kyi
264b6('bum): bya rnam par thad sa rnams tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma dzad par rdzogs par 'chang bya 'o/ mtha kyis gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa rnams bran byed pa yang da/ 
264b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
264b8('bum): bar / 'tshang myi rgya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chad kyi rgya'o// ting nge 'dzin nams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
265a1('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par myi rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
265a2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams phra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// so so
265a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// snying rje chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
265a4('bum): myi rgya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyarkyad bla na mye da pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya'o// rab 'byor da de ci phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag 'dus byas pa/ mngon par
265a5('bum): 'dus byas pa ste/ 'dus byas pa dang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par myi/ nus so// rab 'byor da 'o nad kyang chos thams cad kyang
265a6('bum): lam bsgrubs pa dang las bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/ 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir mi ma yin no// chos de dag gi myi skye ba dang myi 'byung ba gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa yang de yin te/ 
265a7('bum): delta bas na byang chub sems dpa' mas sa dpa' chem po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'azung ste/ dge ba'i com sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa 'am/ chus rnams kyi pha ros tu phyi rang pa 'am/ zam pa'i pha
265a8('bum): rosang sa phyin pa 'am brtsor 'grus kyi sa ros su phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyim ro lad tu byin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa 'am/ nang thongs nyid dag / kyi thong ba nyid dam/ byis
265b1('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don ras pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
265b2('bum): dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong
265b3('bum): pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam
265b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden
265b5('bum): ba rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed/ pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dam/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyos
265b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam pam tharang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smo pa byed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzind nams sam/ gzungs kyi sgornams sas
265b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos kang
265b8('bum): rang kang thom pa yang de thams cad sbru ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ba tshon 'grus
266a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
266a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyi/ 
266a3('bum): dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
266a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
266a5('bum): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden 'arnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzug
266a6('bum): skyed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams dang / rnam par b.rang ba rnams dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / nam por sa ra pa'i gaslong ba nyid dang macan ma byed pa dang / blon pa myed pa
266a7('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byas
266a8('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag yongs su thogs par ma byas par sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
266b1('bum): par bya bar myi nus pas de'i phyir de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i chos gang dang gang com yang de thams cad rmyi lam lta bur shes so// 
266b2('bum): sgra brnyan lta bur shes so// myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa rmyi lam
266b3('bum): lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
266b4('bum): tu phyind pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myi ga yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
266b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so// smra ba rnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma ltabu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol
266b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rmyi las lta bur shes so// sba brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / yu lang pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab
266b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa rmyi las lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srusad pa lta bur shes so// 
266b8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// 
267a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid skyil ma lta bur zhes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smras pa lta bur shes so// 
267a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid kyisas su bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig sor lta bu dang / smyig chu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / skul pa ste bur shes so// de zhes
267a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / yuld pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab
267a4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyi darmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// 
267a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po ste/ pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig sor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / stsal pas
267a6('bum): bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de zhes
267a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// del
267a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// 
267b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chosanas 'das sngopa nyid myilam lta bur she so// sgra brtan pa zhud byin so sta bu dang / smyig rgya lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / yul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
267b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha
267b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab
267b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid darmyi lam lta bur shes so// sma brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru sa pa lta bur shes so// 
267b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yon lta bu dang // smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa
267b6('bum): lta bu shes so / deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brta lta bu dang / myig sor sa bu dang / smig rgyal bu dang / smrams bu dang
267b7('bum): pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshemyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyilam lta bur shes so/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yomalta bu dang / smig rgyu sa bu dang / slu ba lta bu dang
267b8('bum): srul da pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang sgyu ma
268a1('bum): lta bu dang / yul da pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu
268a2('bum): lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / su sad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor
268a3('bum): bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sbru ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / 
268a4('bum): myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan
268a5('bum): lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgyu ma ste bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul ki rka
268a6('bum): rnams rmyil ma lta bur shes so sna brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sdig rgyalta bu dang / sbru ma la bu dang / yul pa lta bu shes so/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i dbang po
268a7('bum): rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs nas
268a8('bum): rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang myig o lta bu skyig cus bu da sbru la bu dbus pa sa na shes so// de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rmyi lam su bur shes so// sgra brnyan
268b1('bum): lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / su la pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi lam lta bur shes so// 
268b2('bum): sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rmyi lam lta
268b3('bum): bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams rmyi lam
268b4('bum): lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad mye
268b5('bum): pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang n+ya/ yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul dab lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
268b6('bum): tshel/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / yul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha
268b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i cho rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes so// de shes
268b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 
269a1('bum): srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan
269a2('bum): lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru la pa lta bur zhes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sprul
269a3('bum): brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / smra sa lta bu dang / yul pa lta bur zhes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin nams myil ma la bur shes so// ska brtan
269a4('bum): lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig chu lta bu dang / spras lta bu dang / phrul ba lta bur zhes so// de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pas spyod pa'i ma/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rmyilam lta bur zhes so
269a5('bum): sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu su bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul dpa lta bur shes so// de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
269a6('bum): stobs rnams rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srus pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tsheskye
269a7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyis sa su bu shes so/ sna brgyas sa bu dang / myig sor la bu dang / TIg tus bu dang / smrasas bu dang / sus dpa sa su shes so// deshes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pas myod pa'i chen
269a8('bum): mo yang dag par rig pa rnams srims la bu shes so// swa brnya sa bu dang / rtsig soras bu dang / phyig sus bu dang / snum sa bu dang / yus dpas bum shes so// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dmas khyod \u0f7f/ 
269b1('bum): snying rje chen po rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srulang pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas
269b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur zhes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
269b3('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sru lad pa lta bur zhes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshelam
269b4('bum): gi rnam pa shes pa nyid rmyi lam lta bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa lta bur shes so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
269b5('bum): myod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi lam s+yA bur shes so// sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig sor lta bu dang / smigab+hu lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / srul pa sta bur zhes so// 
269b6('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang skyi lam lta bu la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// sde brnyan la spyod do zhes bya bar zhes so// myig sor la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// smyig rgyu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam
269b7('bum): sgyu ma la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// srul pa la spyod do zhes bya bar shes so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i chos rnam
269b8('bum): dngos po byed par 'a nad te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po byed par 'dzind te de ltar
270a1('bum): bcu zhi brnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myong ba'i tshe/ myig yor lta bu'i chos dngos po myed par 'dzi nad te/ de ltam 'azung zhing rnam pa thams
270a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzind te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// zhes
270a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sa myong pa'i tshe/ sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'dzind te/ de ltar bzung nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
270a4('bum): pa'i che/ yul dpa lta bu'i chos rnams dngos po myed par 'a drand te/ de ltar bzung zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bzung du myed
270a5('bum): bsam gtan ki pha rold tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// bzod pa/ 'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
270a6('bum): tu phyirnyed pa yang bzung du byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang bzung du byed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang bzung du byed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang bzung du byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'thung du byed do// stong pa nyid
270a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do/ 
270a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzung tu myed do// chos thams
270b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// 
270b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzung du myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bzung du myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bzung du byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang nas kyang bzung du myed do// dbang
270b3('bum): po rnams kyang bzung du byed do// stobs rnams kyang bzung du myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang bzung du myed do// 'phags pa 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sang bzung du byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
270b4('bum): rnams kyang 'azung du myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang bzung du byed do// chad skyed pa rnams kyang bzung du byed do// gzug pa byed pa snyoms par 'dug pa rnams kyang bzung du byed do// nas par tharang pa
270b5('bum): rnams kyang baphung du byed do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams kyang bzung du byed do/ nam lam thar po'i snang stong pa nyid dab macan ma skyed pa dang / smon pa byed pa bzung du byed
270b6('bum): mngon pa shes pa rnams kyang 'jung du skyed de/ de 'dzidi rnams kyang 'thung du byed do/ gnas kyi nonapas kyang bzung ba byed do// de ben de gshegs pa'i thobs rnams kyang bzung byed de/ kyi 'dzig
270b7('bum): rnams kyang bzung du myed do// mi ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang 'azung du med do/ med po song ba dur byed do// rgya ma pa rnams kyang bcu du byed do// dag pan bya
270b8('bum): dpa' sems dpal chen po chos thams cad kyang bzung du myed par shes par byas zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang na la dond tu gnyer to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mi ga
271a1('bum): du myed cing dngos po myed pa ste/ rmyi lam lta bu smra brnyan lta bu myig yor lta bu smyig rgyu lta bu sgyu ma lta su/ srul pa lta bu ste/ sems can rnams kyis chos de dag ma shes ma mthong ba ma gtogs par gzung
271a2('bum): du myed pa'i chos kyis gzung du myed pa'i chos gang yang thob par myi nus pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi dond tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
271a3('bum): 'jug ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gcig tong yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu gtong ngo // tshul khrims gang ni srung yang sems can thams cad kyi dond tu srung ngo // bzod pa gang ci sgom
271a4('bum): yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu sgom mo// brtson 'grus gang mi ma yang sems can thams cad kyi don tu chom mo/ bsam gtan kar ci la yang mnyam par gzhog kyang sems can thams cad kyi don
271a5('bum): tu mnyam par gzhog go/ shes rab gang ci sgom yang sems can tham sa cad kyi dond tu sgom ste/ bdag gi don tu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams
271a6('bum): kyi don ma gtogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gang sems can myed pa la sems can gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 
271a7('bum): bdag myed pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srog myed pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gso ba myed pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang
271a8('bum): skyes bu myed pa la skyes bu'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / gang zag myed pa la gang zag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed can myed pa la shed can gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang / shed bdag myed pa la shed bdag ni
271b1('bum): 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed pa po myed pa la byed pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po myed pa sa byed du 'jug pa po 'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / srong 'pho'i myed pa la spong ba po'i 'du shes
271b2('bum): su gnas pa dang / srong bye 'jug pa po myed pa la spong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / tshor ba po myed pa la tshor ba po 'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / cho du 'jug pa po myed pa la chor du 'jug pa po li 'du shes
271b3('bum): su gnas pa dang / shes pa po myed pa la shes pa po'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang / mthong ba po skyed pa la mthong ba po'i 'du shes su gnas pa de dag phyi na ci log las rnam par 'grel te/ byin ci log las
271b4('bum): rnam par bkrol zhing 'chi ba myed pa'i dbyings su 'god do// des bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su rgyu ste/ bdag gi 'du shes sam/ sems can gi 'du shes sam/ srog gi 'du shes sam
271b5('bum): 'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/ gso ba'i 'du shes sas/ skyes bu'i 'du/ shes sam/ ka zag gi 'du shes sam/ shed can gyi 'du shes pa shed 'dag gi 'du shes mam/ byed pa po'i 'du shes
271b6('bum): sam/ byed du 'dug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ spong ba po'i 'du shes sam/ srong du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes sam/ tshor du 'jug pa po'i 'du shes sam/ shes pa po'i 'du shes sas
271b7('bum): mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su myi rgyu ste/ de g.yo ba dang rlos sems dang / 'dor ba dang / smos pa de dag btang nas sros pa myed pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs shing mang du gyod de/ rab 'byor nganas rba
271b8('bum): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag nyid chos gang la yang mngon par zhend pa myed sa/ sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhend pa byed
272a1('bum): pa la rab tu 'god de de ni 'jig rten gi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rten gi
272a2('bum): tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ ma lags kyi don dam par mngon par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'as lad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di mngon par
272a3('bum): rdzogs pam sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar ni 'jig rten ki tha snyad du brjod pa ste/ de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu kang yang myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
272a4('bum): 'di lta ste chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni myi dmyigs pa ste/ de gnyis kyis ni ka nga yang thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed
272a5('bum): dor// gso lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na rgaN+Da/ sa su ma mchis pas thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram
272a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa ma ya dpa/ gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang mdog slos 'gyur ba myed de/ gnyis su myed pas kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba myed de/ ka la gnyis kyang myed la myi
272a7('bum): gnyis pa yang byed pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dini thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon pa ma rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba na thob pa po/ chos mnyam pa nyid sa sros pa byed de/ 
272a8('bum): spros pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos dang dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyis mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
272b1('bum): bka' sa lad pa/ gang la dngos po myed pa dang dngos po myed pa yang ma yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang yongs su brjod pa myed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid de chos mnyam pa nyid po de dag ni brjod du myed pa'o// 
272b2('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmyigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang myed de/ chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o// chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa 'am/ 'phags pa 'am
272b3('bum): chos gang gis kyang shes par myi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o// gso yad pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
272b4('bum): pa'/ rab 'byor de chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yus ma yin te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang byang chu
272b5('bum): bam byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no/ gsos dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
272b6('bum): rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sbyar ba ma lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dgas tes mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa da
272b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul / mnga' sbyar bar yang 'gyur na/ 
272b8('bum): rab 'byor nga so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin par
273a1('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
273a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid dang myi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag
273a3('bum): gang yang myed do// de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni byis pa so so
273a4('bum): 'i skye bo'o// 'di ni rgyund tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan ka phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'din
273a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su byang ba myed de rnam par rtog pa re/ dag ni mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs so// gsolang pa bcom
273a6('bum): ldan 'das de ste chos mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'o// 'di nin rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas
273a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag myi dbyinas na/ des so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyu dang
273a8('bum): zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
273b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor de de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thas cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang
273b2('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtso
273b3('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir
273b4('bum): ba rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnam sa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
273b5('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'a/ das ci'i srad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag / 'jig
273b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog
273b7('bum): kyang gzhan zhig la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dag gis gsungs pa'i don 'am yod pa ltar na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang
273b8('bum): gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon
274a1('bum): mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/ chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/ myi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa bstan/ 
274a2('bum): du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o// de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye ba'o// 'di ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni
274a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes
274a4('bum): rnam par 'god par bgyi ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams rnam par dkod
274a5('bum): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ mthu'o// rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ de ste de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
274a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir chos rnams rnam par dkod pa ma mdzad na/ sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/ byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par
274a7('bum): mngon nam/ myi yod par mngon nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum kyi lha yod par mngon nas/ mche ma'i lha yod par mngon nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon nam
274a8('bum): 'phrul dka'i lha yod par mngon nam gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lha yod par mngon nas/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi sku yod par
274b1('bum): mngon nam/ tshangs chen ki lA yod par mngon nam/ snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam// tshad myed snang ba 'i lha/ yod par mngon nam kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nas/ dge
274b2('bum): ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ chung che'i sgra yod par mngon nam/ tshad
274b3('bum): myed che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam myi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ myi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nas shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/ gya nom sdang ba'i
274b4('bum): lnga yod par mngon nam/ 'og myin ki lha yod par mngon nam nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam cung zad myed pa'i
274b5('bum): skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nas 'du shes byed 'du shes byed myin skye mched kyi sa yod par mngon nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa song pam mngon nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
274b6('bum): yod par mngon nam/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan ka pha rol tu phyind pa yod par mngon nam/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu
274b7('bum): phyind pa yod par mngon nam Ni/ nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nas/ phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ phyinang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam chen po stong pa nyid
274b8('bum): yod par mngon nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam
275a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ 
275a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sod par mngon nam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
275a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/ rdzu 'phrul ka rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nas/ dbang po rnams yod
275a4('bum): par mngon nam stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan la dka brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ 'phags pa'i bden
275a5('bum): pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ bsam gtan rnams yod par mdo na nas/ tshad myed pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzugs myed pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam rnam
275a6('bum): bar tha rad pa rnams yod par mngon nas/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yod par mngon na
275a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams yod par mngon nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngon nam myi 'jigs
275a8('bum): pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nas/ byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam dra/ snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'ayod
275b1('bum): por mngon nam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yod par mngon nam/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ chos dkon mchog yod par mngon
275b2('bum): nam/ dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/ theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yo
275b3('bum): par mngon nam/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/ brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/ phyir myi 'ong ba yod par mngon
275b4('bum): nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
275b5('bum): sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/ gso sad pa/ bcom ldan 'angs chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par myi 'gyur ro// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHlad pa/ rab 'byor de de lta bas
275b6('bum): na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las yang myi g.yo la chos rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// rnams bya la ka khog pa ca mdza& ta tha da// dang #
275b7('bum): bam po / ga so la pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba de
275b8('bum): bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su lan+da/ 
276a1('bum): pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi g.yo ba sags sam/ de bzhin du brgyad pa yang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa la rnams kyang chos mnyam
276a2('bum): pa nyid las myi gso ba lags sam/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam bu nyid las myi g.yo ba
276a3('bum): lags sam/ de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags sam/ de bzhin du byang chub
276a4('bum): sems dpal yang chos mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo ba lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la dpa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin nol/ re de bzhin te/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad ni chos
276a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid las myi g.yo'o// chos mnyam pa nyid las kyi da'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs
276a6('bum): rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzham ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyod myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i sa
276a7('bum): gang yin pa doni ma la'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon byed pa nyid
276a8('bum): dang yang dag pa'i mtha' muganan dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sa nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyi / 
276b1('bum): chos skyon byed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mara'o// de nyid ni mo su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
276b2('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos
276b3('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
276b4('bum): dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni lan cig phyi'o ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhi
276b5('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid da dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni phyir myi 'o
276b6('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
276b7('bum): mtha'o// de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nod pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyon
276b8('bum): myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
277a1('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'o// de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma no da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzha
277a2('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de las myi 'da'o// 
277a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni chos nyid dang / chas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
277a4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/ der dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang myed do// rab 'byor kyis gsos dpa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
277a5('bum): de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de nyid dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ 
277a6('bum): de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyund tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
277a7('bum): da nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chom mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyisam mnyam pa nyid/ de ba'i gshegs
277a8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid kyi 'dra ba'i chos 'dis ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
277b1('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / myig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / s+ye dang / lus dang / yid dang // gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / mo dang / reg dang / chos dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / byig ki wu
277b2('bum): te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i rnas par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
277b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus
277b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chongar ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang // sa'i kham
277b5('bum): dang / chu'i khams dang / s+ye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rten du ts+yai/ nga 'breld par 'byung ba dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung
277b6('bum): ba'i yan lag dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / swa ba'i rnas pa thams cad dang / bsam gtan dang / cad myed pa dang / gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol/ 
277b7('bum): tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyird pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277b8('bum): ba dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / smon las kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / se shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / 
278a1('bum): na ga na dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / b+hU rgyas gnasas rnam pa dang / dab pa rnams dang / grobs rnams dang / chu kyi garnams dang/ chags pa'i sem sa
278a2('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen nyid dang / 
278a3('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
278a4('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spong nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngobo nyid song
278a5('bum): nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par na/ tug pa dku dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin
278a6('bum): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sang
278a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/ bcom ldan 'das
278a8('bum): de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu myi 'dra ba gcig las gcig 'das pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan la/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
278b1('bum): 'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te// myig gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
278b2('bum): lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg
278b3('bum): gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lce'i
278b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus
278b5('bum): te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid da kyang gzhan/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus/ kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yid kyi 'dus te/ 
278b6('bum): reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor/ 
278b7('bum): ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar
278b8('bum): tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ s+ye'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ nam mkha'i khas
279a1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par zhes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
279a2('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ le nad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan
279a3('bum): srid pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan// 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ lta bI
279a4('bum): rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang
279a5('bum): gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang ka/ zhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 
279a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
279a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
279a8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
279b1('bum): raba'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang ba'ang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid lachas par kyang gzhas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gangs
279b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi chos
279b3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang ka'
279b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bsam gta na rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
279b5('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyi/ nga gzhan/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
279b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan
279b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ byams pa chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzha
279b8('bum): snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ myi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'das
280a1('bum): byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar mtshan nyid myi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid mtshan nyid gcig pa
280a2('bum): 'gyur lags/ chos rnams rnam par dgod pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang la gdams shing chos rnams tha dad du
280a3('bum): bgyi ba lags/ chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyad par myi nus na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
280a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sa nas sar 'bar zhing skyon myed par 'dujug pa lags/ ji ltar spyon myed par zhugs nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis
280a5('bum): las 'das te/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid ba lags/ ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par che zhing sbyin pa/ 'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par babyed pa dang / 
280a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi
280a7('bum): ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / de dag la rnam par the bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
280a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ de dag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs
280b1('bum): bu sbyin par bgyid pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhim yongs su 'dzind pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHsad pa/ rab 'byor dgang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid ga pa yin pa
280b2('bum): de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'bra ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa'i
280b3('bum): de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa
280b4('bum): nyid de nyid byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams chom mnyam pa nyid/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid
280b5('bum): yin na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor da deji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid spong
280b6('bum): nyid ma yin nam/ tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ 'brugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin par nyid slong pa nyid ma yin nas na
280b7('bum): par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ myig gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i chos nyid na
280b8('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid yin
281a1('bum): nam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid ga yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ skra'i chos nyid ga yin pa de nyid 'astong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 
281a2('bum): dral bas nyad gang ldan pa nga nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
281a3('bum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stob pa nyid ma yin nam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang sim po nyid slong pa nyid ma yin nas/ snga'i rnam par
281a4('bum): shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sde'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid la yin nam/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa mchos nyid ga pa yin pa
281a5('bum): de nyid sto pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ram/ pa nyid ga pa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byig ni 'dus nyerag pa 'tsham nyid gang yin pa nyid slong pa nyid pa
281a6('bum): yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid ga pa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bu'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid dang
281a7('bum): byig gi 'dus kyidag pa'i byed kyis tshor ba 'tshab nyid gang med par nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ na pa'i 'dus nyi ga pa bya dbyis rapa nyid gang yin pa nying stong pa nyid pa semam lnga'i du
281b1('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ khro'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshwa chos sdig pa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos
281b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de rje sngo pa nyid ma yin nam// sa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyidas
281b3('bum): yin nam/ chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mye'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
281b4('bum): yin nam/ nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gapa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam// ma rin
281b5('bum): pa'i chos nyid ga pa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnapar zhes pa'i chos nyid ga pa yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
281b6('bum): yin nam/ tshor ba chom nyid ka ba yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ sa dad pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ming 'i
281b7('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rga zhi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
282a1('bum): pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid
282a2('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
282a3('bum): pa nyid ma yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas// nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi
282a4('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ phyi nang po/ rapa nyid kyi chos nyid kang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
282a5('bum): yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong / pa nyid ma yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin/ pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
282a6('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
282a7('bum): yin nam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
282a8('bum): kyi chos nyid kang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid pa
282b1('bum): nan blo byigs pa stong pa nyid dus pa nyid gang yin pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin ram dadas po byed pastong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid sa yin napa/ thob nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid ga yin
282b2('bum): de nyid tho pa nyid ma yin nam/ dngos po byed mamathom nyid spong ba nyid kyichos nyid ga yin pa cing spong pa nyid pa yin nas/ dran pa nye bar gzhas pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid spong ba nyid ma yin nas
282b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
282b4('bum): yin nam/ stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid dam yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan laka rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
282b5('bum): brkyang pa'i chos nyid kang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ 28gas pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yi nanam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
282b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam parathar
282b7('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang man
282b8('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin

283a4('bum): rnapa shA nan sa kyi 'o'i bru bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma na nam/ rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
283a5('bum): ma yin nas/ sam gi rnas pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa re nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi tshe/ sa nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ rgyu nang
283a6('bum): tu zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ ra
283a7('bum): bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid ka yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid ga pa yin pa de'i sgo ba nyid ma yid de/ de bzhin
283a8('bum): gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bal dpa lon spong ba nyid la gzugs kyi san
283b1('bum): nyid dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du shes kyis can nyid dam/ 'du byed kyi ma tshan nyid dam/ rnam par shes pa'is can nyid dang/ byin gims nyid dam / na pa'i mtshan nyid dam 'am ma nyid da spang
283b2('bum): byig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ na pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid das/ swa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sde'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid das
283b3('bum): byinam pa shes pa mtsha / byig gi dus na nyid na pa'i 'dus te ga pam nyid tha'i 'du ba'i
283b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sa'i khams kyis tshan nyid dang / chu'i khams kyis tshan nyid dam / bya'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dang / rlung gi khams kyis tshan nyid dang / rab sa
283b5('bum): shA shA rmArnam par shes pa'i khams kyim tshan cid sa/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'du byed gis can nyi / rnam pa shes pa'i mnyid nga/ kyi da gzugs kyim na nya
284a1('bum): skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ lend pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rga shi'i
284a2('bum): mtshan nyid dam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i mtshwa/

284a5('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ thog ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
284a6('bum): mtshan nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam
284a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rtsul
284a8('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan
284b1('bum): nyid dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par
284b2('bum): tha rad pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mngon
284b3('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan

284b7('bum): dam dgra bcom pa 'i nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur
284b8('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmyigs sas/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal dpa/ rab 'byor pa des pas mnas grangs des na 'dis mamis
285a1('bum): par bya ste/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la yang so so'i skye bo myed/ so so'i skye bo las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yang myed/ dad pa'i rjes su
285a2('bum): 'brang ba las gud na yang de myed de la yang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba myed/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang brgyad pa yang myed/ brgyad pa las gud na yang de yang myed/ de la yang rgyun
285a3('bum): tu zhugs pa myed/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba myed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na yang de myed de la yang phyir myi 'ong ba myed/ phyir myi 'ong ba las gud na yang
285a4('bum): de myed/ de la yang dgra bcom pa myed/ dgra bcom pa las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang rang sangs rgyas myed/ rang sangs rgyas gu da na yang de myed/ de la yang byang chub sems dpa' myed
285a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' las gud na yang de myed/ de la yang de ba zhin gshegs pa myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na yang de myed par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
285a6('bum): 'das chos de nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/ 'dus ma bgyis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma ma yin te/ 'dus bya
285a7('bum): las gud na yang 'dus ma byas dmyigs su myed/ 'dus ma byas gud na yang 'dus byas dmyigs su myed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang
285a8('bum): yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa/ bstan tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'o// de yang de
285b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi don dam par ma yin te/ don dam par lus kyi 'du byed dam/ ngag gi 'du byed dam/ yid kyi 'du byed myed de/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang

289b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang zag rnams dkod pa'i chos de dag kyang srul pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' san lad pa/ rab 'byor de chos thams

290a1('bum): 'das pa yang 'jalang par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ya pa/ rab 'byor nga de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis/

290b1('bum): pa la ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
