290b8('bum): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong pa'o// gnas myed par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// gzhi myed par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// kun gzhi ma skyes par mthong pa ni de bzhin gsheg
291a1('bum): pa mthong ba'o// bag la nyal spangs par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// spros pa myed pa'i ye shes mngon gsum du bya ba mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// bsam gyis
291a2('bum): myi khyab pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// myi mnyam pa myed pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
291a3('bum): pa'o// mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mthong ba dang / le nad pa myed par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// mchog dang rab mchog dang / dri ma myed pa dang / tri ma dang bral ba dang / dga' ba dang / rnyog
291a4('bum): pa myed pa dang / shi nad tu dad pa'i dbyings mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// srid par 'byung ba'i 'gro ba yongs su rmad par gyurd par mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// 'gro
291a5('bum): ba dang / 'ong ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho las rnam par gro/ la ba'i ye shes mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// nam mkha'i ngos ltar dri ma myed pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs
291a6('bum): pa mthong ba'o// ma 'dres pa'i dbyings mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o// byams pa kun tu g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar gyur pa yin te/ spros pa thams cad
291a7('bum): dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba yin no// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ yongs su dag pa'i mye long ki dkyil 'khor la/ skyes bu'i myig gi dbang po skyon myed par gyur pa la la zhig gis/ rang
291a8('bum): gi bzhin ras kyi rnam par gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' log par g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / mtshan ma thos
291b1('bum): cad dang bral ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpas gzugs stong pa nyid du kun tu mthong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te/ 
291b2('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du kun tu mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// gal te stong pa nyid la gzugs mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma
291b3('bum): yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par kun tu mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no/ 
291b4('bum): zhes mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba yang gzhan/ 'du shes kyang gzhan/ 'du byed kyang gzhan rnam par zhes pa yang gzhan no zhes mthong na
291b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// gal te gzu kas nyid ni stong pa nyid do zhes mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma thong ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du
291b6('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid ni stong pa nyid do zhes mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// byams pa gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste
291b7('bum): yi ge kang gis gzugs so zhes brjod par byed pa'i yo kaM de nyid kyang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin no// byams pa de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rnam par
291b8('bum): shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ yi ge gang gis rnam par shes pa'o zhes brjod par byed pa'i yi ge de nyid kyang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin no// byams pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni sgro btags pa'i
292a1('bum): mtshan nyid de bzhin du stong pa nyid ni ma yin no// 'di ni slu ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin du sgro btags pa myed cing slu ba myed pa yin no// byams pa ngo bo nyid thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni stong pa nyid ce
292a2('bum): bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba 'di ni stong pa nyid dong / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid do// brjod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i tshig gi lam thams cad las 'das pa yi ge myed pa
292a3('bum): btags pa myed pa/ btags par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba/ myig kas mthong ba myed pa/ rna bas thos pa myed pa/ sna 'as bsnam du myed pa/ su yis myang du myed pa/ sus kyis reg tu myed pa
292a4('bum): yid kyis bsam par byar myed pa/ rnam par gzhag pa rna mas dang bral ba bstand pa las 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ gos pa myed pa/ snang ba myed pa/ yi ge myed
292a5('bum): pal 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul tu gyur pa'agro ba dam pa yang dag par stond pa/ lta bar rtogs pa thams cad mnas 'byind pa/ 'dzind pa thams cad nges par 'joms
292a6('bum): par byed pa kra nyes pa thams cad selang par byed pa snang bar byed pa/ gsale bar byed pa/ kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa/ skye bo mkhas pa ma
292a7('bum): la yang dag par sad par byed pa mthong ba ni stong pa nyid mthong ba ste/ byams pa stong pa nyid kang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa le/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa kang yin pa deni de bzhin
292a8('bum): gshegs pa nyid do// byams pa kang gis stong pa nyid yang dag par mthong ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mthong ba des ni de bzhin
292b1('bum): gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// yang ji nas kyang sems can byed pa dang / srog myod pa dang / gang zag byed pa dang / gso ba skyed pa dang / skyes bu byed pa dang / shed can byed pa dpa shed bdag myed pa dang
292b2('bum): rtag pa myed pa dang / chad pa myed pa dang / nga'i ba myed pa dang / nga'i ba myed par ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/ gang de ltar mthong ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te byang chub
292b3('bum): sems dpa' gzugs la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab tu
292b4('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa la khyod pa ma yin no// gal te sa'i khams la 'apyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gyod pa ma yin no// gal te chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlu kyi khams dang ga ram
292b5('bum): mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la gyod nal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gyod pa ma yin no// gas te myig gi rnam par shes pa sa spyod na zhes rab kyi pha rol tu
292b6('bum): byin pa la myod pa ma yin na/ gas rten pa'i rnam pa mashes pa dang / pra'i rnam par shes pa dang / srele rnas par shes pa dang sus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas myongs
292b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ gal te gzugs ni bdag go zhes gyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myong ba ma yin no// de bzhin dugs tho tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
292b8('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bdag go zhes yongs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// kas te sa'i las ni bdag go zhes gyod ni zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang bas spyod pa sa
293a1('bum): yin na/ de bzhin dugal te chu'i khams dang / mya'i rnams dang / rlung gi rnam pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam pa shes pa'i khams ni bdag gnas gyong / shes rab kyi pha rlos
293a2('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// gal te myig ni bdag go zhes spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ma yin no// de bzhin du gas rten pa dang / sna dang / s+ye dang / sus dang / yid ni bdas
293a3('bum): kauzhes kyang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa myod pa ma yin no// gas te bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas kyang par byam zhes gyong na shes rab kyi pa mid du phyidad pas myong byas yin no// den ni
293a4('bum): gal te bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ros tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha ro sa tu phyind pa dang / shes
293a5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyind pa la pyad par bya'o zhes myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la khyod pa ma yin no// gal rtogs rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pas myong b.ras ni de bzhin gshegs
293a6('bum): pa mthong ba yin no// byams pa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa na chos gnyis po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa la kun tu bstenang par
293a7('bum): bya'o// de tsas phyir zhe na/ byams pa stong pa nyid kyi ngobo nyid gang yin pa rin chos kyi dbyings kyi bo nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthon nyid do// byas
293a8('bum): pa gang la mtshan ma myed pa de ni chos kyi dbyings te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// byams pa de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang sngam pas chos 'dis bkre dang / 
293b1('bum): par bya ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
293b2('bum): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par rtog pa rnams ka pa las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa rnam par rtog pa rnams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa las byung ngo // byas
293b3('bum): pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang las byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ byams pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa las byung ngo // byams pas smras pa/ 
293b4('bum): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig gi rnam par shes pa gang las byung byams pa myig gi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs las byung ngo // byasa?s pas smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ka las
293b5('bum): byung / byams pa gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog/ pa las byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gzugs ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ gang don dam pa'i gzug/ 
293b6('bum): de ni brdzun pa'i slu ba'i chos can/ byis pa skye bo rnams la 'drid par byed pa yin na/ de la so so'i skye bo thos pa dang myi ldan pa rnams gzugs kyi 'du shes nges par skye bar 'gyur ro// des de ltar gzugs
293b7('bum): su mngon par brtags nas gzugs la brtend te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rkyend du 'gyur te/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin
293b8('bum): bas nye bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na// de la byis pa la so'i skye bo thos pa dang myi ldan pa rnams yid kyi rnam pa 'di ltar bzang ba nyid dang / gzugs nyid dang / kha dog nyid dang / rgyas pa nyid du nye bar
294a1('bum): rtog par byed do// de de ltar rnam par rtog pas rgyund myi 'chad par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir/ 
294a2('bum): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba yang dag par myi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa rnams ni gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de nyid thams cad du stong pa nyid du yang dag
294a3('bum): par mthong ba dang / gsog nyid dang / gso ba nyid dang / snying po myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byams pa de yang dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu mkhas pa 'am/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi
294a4('bum): slob ma mkhas pas sgyu ma'i las kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chud kyi tshogs rnam pa bzhi po nye bar bsku nang par gyur da la/ de la skyes
294a5('bum): bu mkhas pa la la zhig gis bltas pa dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags par 'gyur da cing des de mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul
294a6('bum): bzhin nye bar dmyigs pa na stong pa nyid yin par stond par byed cing / gsog nyid du bstand pa dang / gsob nyid du bstand pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du stond par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu mar
294a7('bum): byas pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kang dang gang nye bar gyur pa de dang de thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // gsog nyid du mthong ngo // 
294a8('bum): gso ba nyid du mthong ngo // snying po myed pa nyid du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// byams pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzha' tshon nam/ tri za'i grong
294b1('bum): khyer blta na sdug par nye bar 'phags par snang bar gyurd pa dag la skyes bu la la zhig gis mthong ba dang / nyes par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pas nye bar brtags par gyur pa la/ des de
294b2('bum): mthong ba dang / nges par dmyigs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par nye bar brtags par gyur pa na/ stong pa nyid du stond par byed pa dang / gsog nyid du stond par byed pa dang / gso ba nyid du ston
294b3('bum): par byed pa dang / snying po myed pa nyid du stond par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta na yang gzugs de yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir dang / rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'byung ba'i 'du shes yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir
294b4('bum): de de ltar gzugs la mkhas pa dang / 'du shes la mkhas pa ni yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ldan par 'gyur zhing / skyon myed pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / 
294b5('bum): nag nog myed pa dang / nges par 'byung ba can dang / byis pa rnam sa kyi sdom pa la yang dag par 'das pa da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rjes su yang dag par 'jug pa dang / zag pa
294b6('bum): myed pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba dang / gnas myed par gyur pa yin no// de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de'i sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad
294b7('bum): nas thams cad du 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing / nub pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / yongs su brtags pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems rang nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur gyi seMs kyi dbang du myi 'gyur ro// de ltar ses
294b8('bum): la dbang thob nas de'i sems gang dang gang skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de thams cad kyang byang chub la gzhol ba dang / byang chub la 'bab pa dang / byang chub la 'bab par gyur pa dang / mchog dang / khyad par du 'phags
295a1('bum): po dang / rgya che ba dang / 'od gsal ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / ma 'dres pa dang / rgyud gcig tu 'jug pa dang / yid la byed pa gcig dang ldan pa yin te/ 
295a2('bum): 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la byed pa yin zhing de 'dug pa 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'chag pa 'am/ nyal bar gyur da pa na yid la byed pa gzhan myed par de'i sems 'bad pa myed par don kyi bya ba thams
295a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba'i dus la bab par gyur cing / dus de dang nye bar gnas par gyur pa na/ 'bad pa myed par mngal kyi sgor nye
295a4('bum): bar phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / mngal gi sgo nas nges par byung bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji nas kyang chos nyid de la so sor dmyigs pa nyid na/ byang chub sems da'i
295a5('bum): sems 'bad pa myed par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la phyogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la 'a chi ba'i dus la bab par gyur cing / dus dang nye bar gnas
295a6('bum): par gyur da pa na/ 'bad pa myed pa nyid kyis srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing / 'gag pa'i rgyund dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / 'gag pa'i rgyun la rjes su gzhol ba dang / 'gag pa
295a7('bum): rgyund la bab par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems 'bad pa myed par dod kyi bya ba thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// 
295a8('bum): byams pa 'di lta ste dper na lha'i 'jig rtend du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las can rnams ni/ 'bad pa myed par lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i
295b1('bum): sems 'bad pa myed par don gi bya ba thams cad kyis/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar sems bskyed kyang mngon par shes par skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa de la
295b2('bum): byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par kyis byed de/ sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs
295b3('bum): yin no// gang sems can yang nye bar myi dmyigs la/ 'khor ba'i nges pas kyang gos par myi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par yin no// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes
295b4('bum): rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par ni kun tu spyod pa gnyi sa mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// kun tu spyod pa gnyis mthong bas ma gos pa ni shes rab kyi khyad
295b5('bum): par ro// nyan thos kyi nges pa las 'das pa 'di ni bya chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// phyi dang
295b6('bum): nang gi bdag nyid can gi dngos po yongs su spong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// rnam par smyin pa la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// tshul khrims kyi
295b7('bum): sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de dpa tha myi dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// khro ba myed pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byas
295b8('bum): pa'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// brtson 'grus 'bar ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// yid yongs su skyo ba myed pa ni byang chub sems pa'i
296a1('bum): shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni byang chub sem dkyi kerab gyi stobs so// de la mngon par zhend pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab
296a2('bum): kyi khyad par ro// shes rab sgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can dang srog nye bar myi dmyigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba la gnas pa ni byang
296a3('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can la ltos pa myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yongs su ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
296a4('bum): rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi sku yang dag par stond pa ni byang/ chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas snga gas pa nyid du yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i ni
296a5('bum): rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas cig nyi dadu stond pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi mthu sna tshogs pa nyid du ston pa ni byang chub sos
296a6('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu gcig pa nyid du stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed
296a7('bum): par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sangs rgyas kyi
296a8('bum): zhing yongs su 'dzind pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su smond pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
296b1('bum): rgya che ba yang dag par lend pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// zab mo'i spyod pa yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu nges par 'byung ba la
296b2('bum): gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// srid pa tha ma pa'i nges par 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dbang phyug che ba'i lha'i 'jig rten du skyes shing gnas te/ 
296b3('bum): mngon par byang chub pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang dag par stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bdud kyi las yod
296b4('bum): su shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bdud thams cad tshar bcad pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo legs par skor
296b5('bum): pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhi
296b6('bum): du shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par stond pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la so sor rtog pa
296b7('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// de rnams yang dag par ston pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// zhi ba'i tshul mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
296b8('bum): rab kyi stobs so// myi zad pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos mngon gsum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes
297a1('bum): rab kyi stobs so/ lam de rab tu shes par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par mo// chus gcig mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi ma
297a2('bum): sna tshogs pa'i tshul stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// nyon mongs pa nye bar myi dmyigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po rang
297a3('bum): shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don dam pa mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs pa kas sad par byed pa'i
297a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// 'dus byas dang 'dus pa byas tshul gcig tu yang dag par stond pa ni bya chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mtshan nyid
297a5('bum): sna tshogs pa nyid du stond pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes ra ba kyi khyad par ro// byams pa cheran po la 'jug pa ni byang chu/ ba sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ sems can rnas
297a6('bum): la phan par 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// snying rje chen po la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems cadan rnams la bde bar 'dod pa ni byang chub
297a7('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i zhes rab kyi stobs so// rtag tu zhi ba nas par 'phel ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// btang snyoms chen
297a8('bum): bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sems can ki bya ba sa spro ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i tshul la gnas pa ni byang chub sems
297b1('bum): dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// gdul bya bsam kis myi khyab pa'i las byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// bsam kis myi khyab pa'i mngon par 'dus byas pa la gnas pa ni byang chub
297b2('bum): sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// mos pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bar bya ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yi ki bsam kyis myi khyab pa ston pa
297b3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba sna tshogs pa stond par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs su mngon par stond pa ni
297b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sgra skad sna tshogs la mngon par mos pa'i gdus bya rnams gdul bar byed pa/ da ni byang chub sems dpa'i zhes rab kyi khyad par ro// spobs pa
297b5('bum): sna tshogs pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs sol/ phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems da pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// dus su smras pa ni byang
297b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// don yod pa'i chos stond par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// yang dag par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ 
297b7('bum): yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid du smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// de nas lha'i bu la la zhig 'khor 'dus pa la de'i nang du 'dus par gyur pa de yang dag pa ma yin par smra ba nyid slar smra ba
297b8('bum): nyid la rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal dpa'i rgyur gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rkyen du
298a1('bum): gyur pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhir gyurd pa gang yin pa de nyid btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi btams pa 'di ji zhig yin snyam mo
298a2('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yun ring por lon pa zhi ka na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ skra'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// sA'i bu
298a3('bum): dag khyed rnams kyis ji ltar rjes su bsams pa dang / rnam par rtog par byed pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu 'o nad kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos gang yang dgal
298a4('bum): yin pa de brdzun pa u ba'i chos can byis pa so so'i skye bo nams 'drid par byed pa/ myi rtag pa myi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa yo ngas su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas na/ de'i phyir yang dag/ 
298a5('bum): pa ma yin pa zhes bshad do// de yang byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par gyis sred pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la nye bar stond pa byed cing / sems can 'di dag
298a6('bum): ni 'khor ba'i chu bor nub pa/ 'khor ba'i btson ra la mngon par dga' ba/ phyi nad ci log bzhis phyi nad ci log tu gyur pa/ bdag tu 'dzind pa dang mngon par ldan pa/ 'jig tshogs lta ba rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro
298a7('bum): ba sna tshogs pa/ blo tha dad par gyur pa/ sdig pa lngas snyigs par gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyurd pa/ sems rnam par myos pa/ sems rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa
298a8('bum): sems la bde ba myed pa/ sems phyi nad ci log tu gyur pa/ 'dus byas kyi bde ba rnams thos nas dge ba'i chos la mngon par gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin la/ dge ba'i chos mngon par gzhos ba de rnams so/ 
298b1('bum): ba rnam par dag par gyur cing sems kyi ngo bo nyid thob nas de'i 'og tu 'dus byas kyi bde ba las bslang ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba la 'jog par byed do// lha'i bu rgyu 'di dang rkyend 'dis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa
298b2('bum): sba ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi khyad par ro zhes smras pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa d+ha
298b3('bum): bus sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi khyad par la yang khyed spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub ses
298b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la re ba myed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
298b5('bum): rab kyi khyad par ro// snyan par smra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// ngag gi sdom pa sbyin pa dang bcang ba nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don
298b6('bum): spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so// byang chub kyi sems 'dod pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// don mthun pa sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs so/ 
298b7('bum): ris mthun pa'i gtul bya ba rnams gdul ba'i thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs
298b8('bum): so la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro// byams pa de ltar bslab pa kun tu spyod pa'i/ 
299a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dkyis gnon pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi khyad par ro / byam sa la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyid ni de 'di
299a2('bum): gshegs pa mthong bar gyur pa yin no// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab nyid ni chos thams cad yongs su bsdu ba shes pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bstand pa na lha'i bu lnga stong kyis myi skye ba'i chos
299a3('bum): la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyu rad to// sA'i bu stong phrag dpag tu myed pa ni bla na myed
299a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// lha'i bu bye ba dpag tu myed pas lha'i mye tog ma dA ra dang / ma dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu
299a5('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa byam sa pa la gtor mngon par gtor bar gyur to// de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis sku gser gyi mdog can las na bza' bzlas
299a6('bum): te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la chos kyi dka' bams lad to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la pa de sogs su thal mo
299a7('bum): sbyor ba btud nas/ na bza' de yang dag par mnos te/ blangs nas spyi bor gzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
299a8('bum): rgyas lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi stond pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gi mdog can las na bza'
299b1('bum): bshus te/ chos kyi mchog dang rjes su mthun par stsa lad pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang ki rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur pa de rnams ni lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa yin
299b2('bum): bar shes par bya'o// yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / theg pa chen po la nges par zhugs shing tshogs yang dag par stsogs par gyur pa
299b3('bum): pa dang / skye ba de dang de yongs su rjes pa na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba la legs par bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rgyun la nges par 'jug par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang 'dzind par byed pa dang / klog
299b4('bum): par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond par byed pa dang / lung nod par byed pa dang / stond par byed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 
299b5('bum): dri dang 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mo
299b6('bum): byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / brjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang mi 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// 
299b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog gsum po ni 'di las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 
299b8('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa dang / yung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed pa de
300a1('bum): mi dbang po ma tshang bar myi 'gyur/ myi khom pa rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur/ ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang bral bar myi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par myi 'gyur te/ gzhan du de 'di
300a2('bum): nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs drung du skye bar 'gyur zhing / der skyes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha rnams su 'gyur zhing / chos kyi dka' ba la mngon par dga'i/ lus kyi dka' ba la mngon par
300a3('bum): dga' bar gyi 'gyur ro// de de nas shi 'phos nas mya'i nang du dad pa dang ldan zhing yang dag par 'byor pa dang / ldan pa'i myi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa byas
300a4('bum): pa las chos bstand pa thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// 'di yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i phan yon par shes par bya'o// 
300a5('bum): de nas lha'i bu dri ma myed par bkod pa zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur da nas/ 'dug ste bcom ldan 'ad/ sa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs
300a6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bkur bstir bgyid pa dang / bra mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / rjed par bgyid pa dang / gsol da pA
300a7('bum): bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi
300a8('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dug gis 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/ skyes 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur/ chus 'chi ba'i dus babyid par myi 'gyur/ mtshon gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur
300b1('bum): rjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / gzhon nu'i gdon gis bzung ste/ 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur te/ gzhams pa dbang po bde bar gnas pa dang / tshig 'khrul pa myed pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i sems kyis
300b2('bum): 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yu lang pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal sa la dpa/ spa'i bu dag de de bzhin te
300b3('bum): de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
300b4('bum): 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub ra byed pa dang / tshul bzhin tu yin la byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya chem yang dag par stond par byed pa de la bdag gis stobs da
300b5('bum): mthu dang / rnyed par bsgrub par bgyid pa dang / bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / yang dag par sba bar bgyi'o// myi ma yin pa rnams kyang de la srung ba byed pa nyid du 'tshal bar bgyi ba
300b6('bum): dang / de la myi ma yin pa rnams bsnyes bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bdud kyi las yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyang de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ba dang / de la gcan gzan gdug pa
300b7('bum): rnams 'tshe bar myi 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang / de'i 'thab pa dang / g.yul 'byed pa dang / mod par smra ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnyid log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ba dang / srag
300b8('bum): cing 'jigs pa myed pa'i rmyi lam mthong ba dang / de'i nyin mo dang / mtshan mo bde bas 'da' bar byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa gang dag yod pa de thams cad mthong ba'i chos la yongs su zad par 'gyur ba
301a1('bum): de la 'go'i nad dam/ myig gi nad dam/ chi ba sogs kyi nad dam/ lto ba'i nad dam/ rlung gi nad dam/ mkhris pa'i nad dam/ bad kan gyi nad dag 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / pha rol
301a2('bum): kyi dpag tshogs gi 'jigs pa 'am/ yul gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ mchi ma 'dzag pa 'am/ yid du myi 'ong ba thos pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i nges pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'byung bar myi 'gyur bar
301a3('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos smra ba gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos pa dang / yang dag par bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / kun
301a4('bum): chub par byas pa'i chos smra ba de la bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang / dge ba'i chos bshes gnyen kyi 'du shes dang / stond pa'i 'du shes dang / nyel
301a5('bum): bar stond pa'i 'du shes skyed par bya'o// des chos sA/ ba de'i yon tan rjes su bsgrag par bya ba dang / bstod pa'i tshig skrag par bya ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa dang / bsnyen
301a6('bum): bkur bya bar 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos smra ba ni 'jig rten long ba rnams la myig ste/ ra bar byed pa yin no// chos smra ba mchod pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa yin
301a7('bum): nol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla da pa/ skyes pa len po lag pa tshig 'di legs khar zhes so// de bzhi na du che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus kyang bshad pa legs so legs so// 
301a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ byams pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
301b1('bum): bam po / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la bka' sa yang pa rab 'byor dkan
301b2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chos par 'dod pas ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i
301b3('bum): sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs myi zad pa spogs pa'i drung na/ tshangs par pyad pa pyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' saHsnad
301b4('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha rol
301b5('bum): tu phyind pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ mi ltar btsal ba lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ngas 'di skad ces ka stsa la to// rab 'byor
301b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol ba na/ sus don tu myi gnyer ba dang / srog la ltos pa myed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dka la myi gnas pa de ltar
301b7('bum): yongs su btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dkon pa zhig tu phyind pa na bar sdang nas sgra 'di lta bu zos par gyur da te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su so bzhig da
301b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur gis/ ji nas kyang lus ngal ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rlugs pa yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / 
302a1('bum): btung ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa de ltar song shig
302a2('bum): rigs kyi bu nang ngam phyi rol kang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon tu ma lta bar song shig/ lho phyogs su ma yin/ nub phyogs su ma yin/ byang phyogs su ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 
302a3('bum): 'og tu ma yin/ phyogs mtshams su yang ma lta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jig tshogs las ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / tshor ba las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin
302a4('bum): 'du byed las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las kyang ma ka yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// mi las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas
302a5('bum): kye chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgya sa kyi chos rnams las nyams par gyur pa de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mya
302a6('bum): cing rjes su 'thob par myi 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can
302a7('bum): thams cad kyi dbugs 'byind par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bsdu zhing bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des
302a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu rtag tu du legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la spras bos te/ 'di skad
302b1('bum): du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i chos dag la mos pa skyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyed kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar
302b2('bum): byal/ dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
302b3('bum): ba dang / smon pa myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / sa skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams stond par byed pa dag la bsnyend par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de su sna
302b4('bum): na ring po kyi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs pa dam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'a gyur te/ rigs kyi bu kang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
302b5('bum): 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis stond par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod kyis byas pa gzo' ba dang / byas pa tshor ba ste/ gang las na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i
302b6('bum): bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bdag gis thos pas sku ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
302b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / nye bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ myi khom pa rnams yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// dal ba phun gsum tshogs pa thob
302b8('bum): bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar phan yon 'di rnams kyis yongs su btags la dge slong chos smra ba la stond pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gi za zing dang
303a1('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar myi bya/ khyod kyis chos smra ba la dond tu gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod
303a2('bum): kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg padag bsnyend par bya/ bstend par bya/ s+yang pA
303a3('bum): bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar stond par byed pa de dag khyod zild kyis mnanang nas/ thabs la mkhas pas yongs su 'grogs pa dang / bstend pa dang / bsnyend par gyis shig ces zer ba yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod
303a4('bum): kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par myi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par myi bya ste/ bdag gis ni thabs la mkhas pa de myi shes so// 'di ni sems can kyi tshul gyis sems
303a5('bum): can rnams kyi dge ba'i phra ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bstend par 'grogs te bsnyen par bya'o// de nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang lo yang chags pa
303a6('bum): 'am/ sgrib pa myed kyis/ skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi tshul yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni
303a7('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gang zag myed pa
303a8('bum): dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmyi lam lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang de/ myig yor lta bu yin no// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing / chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang na ring po myi thogs par
303b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nges par thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod pa'i rikre
303b2('bum): kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing myi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir 'byed par myi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos dond tu gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid yongs su myi skyo bas
303b3('bum): dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus smra de las rjes su bstand pa 'di blangs nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang
303b4('bum): ring por ma phyind par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba dang / su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam nas/ de sa la
303b5('bum): phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing mya ngan byed pa dang / smre sngags 'dond pa bzhin du 'dug go// de sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar byed de// de bzhin du nyin zhag gnyis sam/ 
303b6('bum): gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun kyi bar gi nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo 'da' bar bya ba de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du ngal ba yid la byed pa mya skyed
303b7('bum): rmugs pa dang / kanyid yid la byed pa myi skyed/ bza' yid la byed pa myi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ gang ba yid la byed pa myi
303b8('bum): skye dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa myi skyed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu cig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de bu'i
304a1('bum): mya ngan gis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag
304a2('bum): kis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ba dang / shar phyogs su 'gro ba 'di nye ring ni ci tsam/ su las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang
304a3('bum): yang myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig
304a4('bum): kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smra ba ni legs so// legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
304a5('bum): kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i myang ba myod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / sro ba 'di dang / don tu gnyer
304a6('bum): ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs de nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan/ spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim pa
304a7('bum): bdun gis yongs su bskor pa/ 'obs rim bdun dang / shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun gis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa/ rgyas pa
304a8('bum): bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang / myis gang ba/ grong bar dang / srang mnyam zhing / mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag ki se ri mor bris pa/ bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs dang / khri nyam ngab myed pa/ bar bar dag
304b1('bum): tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing / bskor ba la rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mdal ya ba rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa
304b2('bum): mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi che mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang / rin
304b3('bum): bo che'i zag ku byung bas/ mda' yab gcig shos gzhan dang 'brel da pa/ grong khyer thams cad gser ki tril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khyebs te/ gser gyi dril bu kayer ka de dag la rlung kyis btab na/ sgra 'dza
304b4('bum): zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste dper na/ yan laka lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na// smra 'jam zhing
304b5('bum): snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag che zhing dga' la dag
304b6('bum): mgur spyod do// grong khyer de'i 'khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / legs par 'bab pa/ chu ha cang yang myi grang ha cang yang myi dro bas kang ba dag yod do// chu de la sngon ki las kyi rnam
304b7('bum): par smind pas grub pas/ rin po che sna bdun gi gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas/ che zhing dka' mgur yongs su spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang mye tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang
304b8('bum): pad ma dkar po dag gis khyebs pa/ mye tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la tri zhim po ngad ldang ba gzhan dag gis kyang khyebs te/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na yod pa'i mye tog gi rigs
305a1('bum): las de na myed pa gang yang myed do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshas lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing sta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed mos tshal
305a2('bum): de dag re ren yang rdzing bu 'khor ra yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas/ rin po che sna bdun ki mye tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad mo dang / pad ma
305a3('bum): dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na stug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / mye tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'phang yo tsam he
305a4('bum): sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur stond pa/ 'od sngon por 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bur stond pa 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po

305a6('bum): pa dang / khrung khrung dang / bya ka ran da dang / ka zhad dang / shang shang de'u sgra 'byind pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de da thos cad kyang nga yir bya ba myed cing ris su gcad pa myed de/ 'di ltar sems can dag yun
305a7('bum): ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la lhag par mos pa'i sems can dag ni sngon gi rnam par smind pa las grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbu
305a8('bum): kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim bcu
305b1('bum): dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba bdun gis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i long skyod du rtag tu du rab tu dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan myed ces bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes
305b2('bum): bya ba dang / mye tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ bskyed mos tshal de re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang po'i mchog ces bya ba dang / dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i
305b3('bum): mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / myi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de rnams kyi ngos cig pa gser las byas pa'o// ngos gnyis
305b4('bum): pa ni dngul las byas pa'o// ngos gsum pa ni bye tu rgya las byas pa'o// ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas pa'o// nang gi sa gzhi ni kai ke nu las byas pa la/ gser gi bye ma bdald pa ste/ rdzing
305b5('bum): bu de dag re re na yang them smas rin po che sna bdun tshogs pa/ rnam pa tha dad pas brgyand pa/ smras kyi rim pas mdzes par byas pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas
305b6('bum): kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i keser gi them snas de dag thams cad las kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser ki shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni kye tog ku mu da dang / mud pa la dang / pad ma dkar po
305b7('bum): sna tshogs kyis khebs te/ ngang pa dang / ngur pa dkru chu byug 'an da dang / gzhad nams skad 'byind to// rdzing bu de dag gi 'khor yug kun nas mye tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ mye tog gi shing de dag pa
305b8('bum): rlung gis bskyod pa dang / mye tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang tu ltung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gi drir phyogs shing / kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
306a1('bum): chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa/ bud myed drug khri brgyad stong dang / lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhib 'byor da te me dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can
306a2('bum): skyes pa dang / bud myed kang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dgal la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor da te tshe dga' zhing dga' mgur yongs su myong ngo // yang byang
306a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dka' ste/ dga' mgur spyod cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos
306a4('bum): ldan na 'khod de dag kyang grong khyer ki dbus kyi bzhi mdor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi zhi ga ser gi rkang pa dang / dngul ki rkang pa dang / bye dU r+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa

306a6('bum): kyi the re mu tig gis brgyadang pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu mye tog lnga sA dag mngon par gtor cing / sa byogs des blos sna tshogs dang / gdug pa sna tshogs
306a7('bum): kyis gnod du bdug par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smon to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus pa
306a8('bum): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi rosod tu phyind pa nyan to// don gang dag nyad pa'i sa dang phyi sogs brgyags mang po dang / thog chan sa song zag par
306b1('bum): srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag la la ni lung nod/ sa la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ rgyu de dang rkyen des sems can de dag thams
306b2('bum): cad kyang log par myi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig/
