306b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshig de thos nas/ dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang rab tu mgu zhing dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes
306b7('bum): bu ma de'u drug cas zhig kis zug rdus thog na yid la byed pa gzhan gyi skyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las tha rang par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byingang pa'i smand pa bdag gis nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems par
306b8('bum): 'gyur ro// de ba'i sa su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang gapa 'dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de tham par byed cing / rkang chos thos nas bdag gi dbyigs pa yid la byed pa'o/ 
307a1('bum): par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ma gto// gros kA yA medas myi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ 
307a2('bum): chos thams cad la myi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ ting nge 'di nad gi sgo du ma mngon tu gyur pa nyams su myong ba ni 'dis ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo
307a3('bum): nyid myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad myi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam pa tha dad pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba
307a4('bum): myed par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad myi zhes pa seld pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi
307a5('bum): dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mye tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po myi 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa
307a6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mye long gi dkI lho snang bsgrub pa n+de bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i
307a7('bum): ti 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad kyi sna mas mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sna dang cig dang / mi ge 'brul tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa khengs
307a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rang bzhin rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bying nga
307b1('bum): nges pa zhes bya ba'i tshig dang yi gi 'phrul mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dziding dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge la nang dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
307b2('bum): nam mkhal dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'ang nad dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzugs kyi rdul dang se lad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
307b3('bum): ldog pa'i phyig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang / chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / dbugs 'byind pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / seng ge mngon par spogs pa zhes bya
307b4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sems can thams cad zild kyis ka nond pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / tshul myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
307b5('bum): 'dzind dang pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang the com thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / snying po thams cad kyi nges su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chom
307b6('bum): thams cad la mngon pam 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / mngon par shes pa dang spobs dang myi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge lang ded dang / chos thams cad la mngon par 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i to
307b7('bum): 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi bye brag myed par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyu rang pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes
307b8('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi
308a1('bum): dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos zab mo'i 'od 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / myi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i
308a2('bum): ting nge 'dzind dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'jig rten gsum las mngon par zhend pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting
308a3('bum): 'dzin da dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de nas ma tu gyur da te/ de ting nge 'dzind de dag la gnas te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rnams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs
308a4('bum): myed dpag tu myed pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di rab tu stond pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes
308a5('bum): bya ba byin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di
308a6('bum): bzhin bca ya te/ yongs su tshol pan yang ting nge 'dzidang 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin lhas te rtogs pa na gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba 'am/ snang bar bya ba dang / byang chub tu spyod pa'am/ gang tha
308a7('bum): mabyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yin te/ rigs kyi
308a8('bum): bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems myed par myi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'das lus ka ser ki kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe'
308b1('bum): byung bzang po brgyad bcu dang / 'od 'das gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhes rab bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na myed pa dang / yon tan thams ca
308b2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyis kyang tshad bzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstand par myi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di
308b3('bum): dag nyid la rab tu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// 
308b4('bum): khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shi nad tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasasu zind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur
308b5('bum): tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa ma 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol
308b6('bum): tol// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lad to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na
308b7('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smind par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod yongs su 'dzin
308b8('bum): pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyis des khyod la ji ltar sgo ba bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am/ bskal dpal
309a1('bum): gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las skrag par yang mgo la thod bzhin thogs shing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim 'gror byas te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i
309a2('bum): 'jig rten gi khams na/ gzugs dang / sma dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la skad cig gcig tsam gi drin lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
309a3('bum): rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzind 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thob par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
309a4('bum): gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus dbugs phyung nas myi snang bar gyur da to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzind de dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di
309a5('bum): snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang tu bzhud snyam ste/ de bzhi na gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing myi dga' bar gyur
309a6('bum): tol// yang 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yod
309a7('bum): su 'dzind pa bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin zhing yun ring po nas de bdag gi don byas pa yin gis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste/ nye bar phyi nad nas de
309a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byond de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309b1('bum): chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
309b2('bum): pa chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur sti bya ba'i gos rin po che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam
309b3('bum): bye du r+ya 'am/ tung dang / man shel dang / byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ sa le sbram 'am/ mye tog gam/ spos sam/ mye tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la myed na/ bdag 'di
309b4('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag/ sa kyi drung tu song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am rangs pa myi skye'o snyam du sems so// de nas bya
309b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de lta bu'i yon ta na dag dang / bla ma la gus par yid la byed pa dang / ldan pas mthar da kyis shar phyogs su song ste/ grong khyer chen po shi nad tu yangs pa
309b6('bum): 'byor da pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang myas yongs su gang ba zhig tu phyind pa dang / de grong par gi dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la de'i rin gis byang chub sems
309b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig zad de dengs la btsongs te/ 'khor ba dpag tu myed pa nas 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus a pa dang yang seMs
309b8('bum): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
310a1('bum): tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/ myi su 'dod myi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di
310a2('bum): ni chos kyi 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'di 'dra 'dri bar 'gyur te/ 
310a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ji ltar pyad na myu ra tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon tu rdzogs par 'cha rgya'agyur zhing thos pa rgya mtsho yang thol par
310a4('bum): 'gyur la/ bdud dam bdud kyi tshogs kyi lha rnams kyis myi mthong b.ra'agyur zhing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
310a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ der sem sa can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang ra'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gzhan dag
310a6('bum): kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pam sangs rgyas nas nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram
310a7('bum): ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du myi su 'dod su zhig nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra myi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bar yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems
310a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang gi tshe/ bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
310b1('bum): la bkur sti bya snyam na/ su lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
310b2('bum): chen po rtag tu rul 'di skad ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun gsum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la bdag gis
310b3('bum): gzhal bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par srul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas byang chub sems dang
310b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyar yid myi dga' zhing gdung la mchis byung ba mi nges/ des smras pa bram ze'i khye'u kho ba ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid
310b5('bum): btsongs te/ chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho ba sa ma rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab
310b6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i
310b7('bum): khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la myis ni bya ba myed kyi/ kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der myi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / 
310b8('bum): rkapa bo la dgos na de ri gis nyor byind cig ces sbas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di la bdag gi snying dang khrag dang
311a1('bum): rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs pa rnyed do// bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/ 
311a2('bum): sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras/ 
311a3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
311a4('bum): tu du mtshon rnon po thogs nas/ laka pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag ka zags so// baR+Ya g.yas pa sha myed par btogs nas rus pa gtso ka tu tshig pa'i drung du song ngo po/ de nas tshang dpon ki bu mo zhig khang
311a5('bum): pa'i yang tog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du bla sha myed par btogs nas/ rus pa gcog tu tshig pa 'i drung du song pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi
311a6('bum): bu ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na cha byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste/ dri'o snyam nas tshang dpon gi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ka la der song ste phyi nad nas byang chub
311a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di
311a8('bum): skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// 
311b1('bum): de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bku
311b2('bum): stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan ka rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs
311b3('bum): mkhas pa dag stond par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gi kha dog lta
311b4('bum): bu yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu Na gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od mdom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
311b5('bum): po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / myi 'a jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par 'gyur sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur
311b6('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gis mya khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / de bzhin
311b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba bla na myed pa'i chos rin
311b8('bum): po che yang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod
312a1('bum): pa ni ngo mtsha rad to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang skal pa kang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag
312a2('bum): rgya cher yongs su brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba'i gser dang / nor bu 'am/ mu tig kam/ bye tu r+ya 'am/ dngus sam/ mye tog gam
312a3('bum): bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ mye tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am phye ma 'am / kos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod
312a4('bum): dnga'agrogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dka la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i mapa bskyed
312a5('bum): par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad myi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces
312a6('bum): smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod yi dam la brtan pa ni legs so legs so// de lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub seMs
312a7('bum): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu
312a8('bum): kho bo la snying dang ga dang khrag dag gis bya ba myed kyis/ kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis rigs kyi bu khyod dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod dam pa ji lta bu sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa brgya byin sa
312b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa dag bdag la soHsad cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu lus 'di ni kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyu ra ba'i
312b2('bum): gyil/ dam pa gzhan spongs shika/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la lha'i dpar po brtson pa chung bar gyis shing / lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis
312b3('bum): bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
312b4('bum): lung bstand cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo ba myed par ma khye nad ce na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon bzhi dan du gyur da cig ces bya ba dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid
312b5('bum): la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon bzhi na du gyurd to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa myed
312b6('bum): par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la lan glan pa'i spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
312b7('bum): po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur sheg/ kho bo'i khyim ga la yod pa der 'dong ngo // kho mo pha ma las nor blangs te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub seMs/ 
312b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur bsti bya ba byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas cho
313a1('bum): dpon gi bu mo de bdag gi khyim tu phyind nas pa ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mye tog dang / ka dug pa dang / spos dang / mye tog 'phreng da
313a2('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag bdag la soHlad cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis gsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dbyer
313a3('bum): gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang / bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de nas bdag cag la
313a4('bum): de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de su zhig bu mo rig/ kyi bu de da lta gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
313a5('bum): ded lta'o skol gi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag
313a6('bum): tu ma mchis pa las thar da par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
313a7('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde ba nas/ myi dga' bar sems shing mchi ste/ des nga'i lus bcong bar 'dod na
313b1('bum): lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye bu'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus btsong par 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu du des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
313b2('bum): pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la raka las pas 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhe
313b3('bum): bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u 'i gzugs su bskurd pas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni nga myi 'dod de nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa/ der myi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / 
313b4('bum): rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags brla'i sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nasaphyogs gcig
313b5('bum): tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gar+m+ma ga pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ myi 'di ji'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la
313b6('bum): na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid gi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i
313b7('bum): khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang / rus pa dang rkang dang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang myed do// zhes mchi'o bdag kyis khyod la rin gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di
313b8('bum): skad du 'di ste ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis de la 'di
314a1('bum): skad ces bgyis te rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gi rnam pa 'am khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gis myi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag/ 
314a2('bum): tu myed pa rnams rab tu stond par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gis myi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba
314a3('bum): chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la sro bar bgyid pa ni/ shi nad tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshard to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gto/ 
314a4('bum): na'/ bdag la long spyod rgya chen po dag yod pa ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa myi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir myi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces
314a5('bum): bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tshad ga ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyid pa'i
314a6('bum): nor mang po dag bdag gis sbyin no// bdag nyid khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ka la 'der mchi'o// bdag gyis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod
314a7('bum): kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa dag bdag gis thob par bgyi'o bgyis shing mchis na/ yab yum kyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la saHsad tu gsol da/ bdag gis kyang
314a8('bum): rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i rga ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis
314b1('bum): kyis bstand pa lags na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gis myi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de la lta bu'i

314b3('bum): nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma sa 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad myi bgyi'o//

314b7('bum): brgya'i shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor da cing / mdun tu bdan nas pha ma las sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyogs ka la ba de sogs su dong ngo // de mthar kyis song ba dang / byang
314b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rgyang ring po zhig nas/ grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ sta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gi ra ba rim bdun gis yongs su skor ba
315a1('bum): rta bas bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba rin bdun gyis yongs su bskorang ba dang / chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing

315a8('bum): chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i khang bu legs pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig kyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu thegs pa
315b1('bum): de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa bya ba'i
315b2('bum): phyir/ a ka ru nas po 'ba' zhig bdug par byed do// khang bu legs pa de'i dbus su rin po chesna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

315b4('bum): kyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgyad pa bcas pas khang bu cheg sa pa de 'akod pa chad byed pas brgyan pa pa mthong zhing / su stong phrag du ma rag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sang sa'i rtse con
315b5('bum): man da ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan ki phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor mdzan bar 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor ba mthong ngo // swa'i
315b6('bum): sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhidi thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po byed nyi stong phrag du ma dag rin po che'i khang bu ches

316a1('bum): pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
316a2('bum): myur tu thob par 'gyur ba yin na khyod myi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu

322a1('bum): kyang khyod la lus dbul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur da cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur bstir bgyis

322a3('bum): bsam pas bdag nyid byind cig dang / bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo / bu mo de dag gyis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dod par bya

322a7('bum): cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bur myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes

322b1('bum): gnas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

322b6('bum): bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzind gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyurd cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag dang / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba
322b7('bum): la gnas par gyu rad te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang lo bdun ka bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / rol rkam pa ma skyes te/ 
322b8('bum): gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nas ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri ka pal rigs kyi bu de 'dus nas chos stond par 'gyu
323a1('bum): pa'i chos kyi khri bshams nas/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag legs par btab pa dang / legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gto rad te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
323a2('bum): po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu stond par 'gyur ba der legs par 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub ses
323a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra

323a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lha'i sgra de tho sa pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / I rangs pa dang / rab tu ma ku zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gi bu mo las
323a6('bum): sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
323a7('bum): chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos stond par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad kyi
323a8('bum): snang bar byas nas ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du chu ma rnyed nas yid myi dka' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mtsho
323b1('bum): pa de yang myi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag myi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag
323b2('bum): gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdus che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na myi rung
323b3('bum): na bdag gi lus gdon myi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig ni bla'i/ nus pa myed pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta
323b4('bum): bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de na da sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa
323b5('bum): phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gi bu mo las sotshogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis
323b6('bum): kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang kyi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can kyis dge bar chad bya ba'i grags rnyed par myi 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems
323b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba myed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang 'di
323b8('bum): ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang / song spyod rnams la myi lta ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa lnga
324a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa las sems can tha rad par bya'o// snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtsharang to snyam du seMs
324a2('bum): so'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan dan gi chur bya nad kyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan ki chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam kyis myi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga
324a3('bum): brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam
324a4('bum): gis myi khyab bo// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su chos pa bla na myed do// rigs kyi bu sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag
324a5('bum): pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses/ 
324a6('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu 'di snyam du sems bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis
324a7('bum): sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
324a8('bum): byin gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi pu lha'i mye tog man da ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu mye tog bkram pa kyis shig/ 
324b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos stond cing / seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor da cig ces de la me tog khal stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
324b2('bum): dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der bkram pa byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor da te/ de nas byang chub sems dpal sos
324b3('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzind de las langs te// chos 'phags kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor 'bum phrag tu mas yongs su bskord cing mdun
324b4('bum): kyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stond to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta
324b5('bum): ste dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i// dge slong che gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
324b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
324b7('bum): dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa g.yo' ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
324b8('bum): rlom sems myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa khengs pa myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
325a1('bum): pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skye
325a2('bum): ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'akag pa myed pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa su skye
325a3('bum): pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha'
325a4('bum): rtog pa myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rtog pa myed pa nyid do// gzugs mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ yad tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
325a5('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu myed pa nyid dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// sa'o/ khams su myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
325a6('bum): mu myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu myed pa
325a7('bum): nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes
325a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmyigs su myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnye
325b1('bum): pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa byed pa myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam
325b2('bum): gis myi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsam kis myi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de ltar 'dug bzhin tu de'i tshe/ chos thams
325b3('bum): cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad rlom
325b4('bum): sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos tham sa cad khengs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad
325b5('bum): mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha' mu myed pa
325b6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgya mtsho mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha' rtog pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzugs
325b7('bum): mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sa'i khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang
325b8('bum): chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / nam mkha'i khams su myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / 
326a1('bum): chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ce
326a2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad byed pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
326a3('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de dag las sochags pa/ ting nge 'dzind gi sgo 'bus phrag drug bcu thob par gyurang to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las
326a4('bum): chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // rab 'byor da bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus ting nge
326a5('bum): 'dzin de gi sgo 'bum phrag drug bcu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / 
326a6('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag da dge slong gi dge 'dun gis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems da'i
326a7('bum): tshogs kyis mdun gis bltas te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / mying 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na da lta ba stong
326a8('bum): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos stond pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor da cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / yi ge
326b1('bum): 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gang skyes pa thams cad du yang sangs rgyas
326b2('bum): dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur// skye ba thams cad du yang kar dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon gsum du gyur pa de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmyi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang
326b3('bum): myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// des myi khom pa thams cad ni spangs dal ba phun gsum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor de rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di/ byang
326b4('bum): chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes sgrub par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da de/ lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
326b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sachald pa
326b6('bum): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung bar bya'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zung shig/ chongs shig/ spogs shig/ kun
326b7('bum): chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par stond cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po/ dag gis mnyand par byal/ 
326b8('bum): gzung bar bya/ bcang par bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ 'don par bya/ su nod par bya bstand par bya/ kha ton du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ sregs
327a1('bum): bam chen po la yid gsal zhing rab tu gsal bar legs par bris te/ me tog dang / gtug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / kos dang / gdugs dang / rgya
327a2('bum): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa nas pa mang pos bkur bstir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri sor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga'
327a3('bum): po 'din pa'i rjes su bstan pa'o// de sa phyi zhen/ kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi stonang pa yin nas/ kun dga' bos gsos da bcom ldan
327a4('bum): 'das bdag gi stond pa lags so// bdel par gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad da ces gso med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun
327a5('bum): dka' bo la 'di sad ces bka' su yang to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi sond pa yin te/ kyis yongs su spyad do// kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus
327a6('bum): kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas ris 'gro byas so// kun dka' bo res pas ma su pa bzhugs te
327a7('bum): 'tsho zhing ba zhes pa'i sku 'dis khyod kyis 'phangs pa dang / dad pa dang / gus pa byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dis yang byos shig/ kun dgal po dzin pa
327a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nub par myi 'gyur zhing / ri nas khyod skyes bu tha mar myi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtang ngo // rjes su yongs su gtad ngo // kur
